string.name: STR_CMD_HELP_DESC
string.body: - Command List -\nUse Whisper: '[CharacterName] [Contents], Use Shout: ![Contents], Group Chat: #[Contents], Legion Chat: @[Contents], Trade Window Chat: $[Contents], Invite to Group: /Invite [CharacterName], Leave Group: /leave

string.name: STR_CMD_LOCATION_DESC
string.body: Coordinates of current location: %WORLDNAME0 Region, X=%1 Y=%2 Z=%3

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_MAGICALWEAPON
string.body: Available when equipped with magic weapons

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_REQUIRED_SWORD
string.body: Available when equipping a long sword

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_REQUIRED_WAND
string.body: Available when equipping a magic staff

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FIRE_DESC
string.body: Rough, wild and aggressive by nature, their harsh surroundings toughened the bodies of these people, and they have also gained the power of Fire from the elements.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EARTH_DESC
string.body: A race consisting solely of males since the times of Ancient Elyos, they have obtained the power of Earth following the Cataclysm and have solid and unshakable strength.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WIND_DESC
string.body: Prolonged isolation has led to a highly developed culture for this race. They possess great agility as well as endurance and like to amuse themselves with adventures and hunts.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_LIGHT_DESC
string.body: A race that inherited the most from Ancient Elyos in terms of appearance, they are a proud people who believe they are the Chosen ones as they resemble the Elyos and were mostly spared during the Cataclysm.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WATER_DESC
string.body: They are a race of females who possess the greatest intellectual power among all races, and their evolution sacrificed much of their physical attributes in exchange for the ability to use magic at will.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_WARRIOR
string.body: Warriors specialize in close combat, utilizing their great physical strength and prowess with melee weapons. Once a Warrior reaches a certain level of proficiency, they must choose the way of the Gladiator or the Templar.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SCOUT
string.body: Scouts concern themselves with speed, agility, and awareness. They wear leather armor, making them vulnerable, so they specialize in hit and run tactics. A Scout will eventually become a Ranger or an Assassin.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CLERIC
string.body: Priests use divine power to heal and to bolster the defenses of their allies. They can use both long-range spells and melee attacks to deliver pain to the enemy. Clerics must choose between the path of a Chanter or a Cleric.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_MAGE
string.body: Mages delight in dealing awe-inspiring levels of damage. Their command over the elements is terrifying, but they are relatively vulnerable so they must be clever to survive. Mages may choose the school of the Sorcerer or the Spiritmaster.

string.name: STR_OPTION_AUTODETECTING
string.body: Now adjusting the settings to the computer environment. Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SERVERSHUTDOWN
string.body: The server is unavailable. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INVAILD_ID
string.body: Username is not valid. Please enter it again.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INCORRECT_PASSWORD
string.body: Password is incorrect. Please enter it again.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CONNECTING
string.body: Now connecting.... Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_GAME_START
string.body: Start the game with this character.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_NOW_LOADING
string.body: Now moving.... Please wait a moment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CHOICE_MOUSE
string.body: You can see the character by using the right mouse button or mouse wheel.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CREATE_RACE_INFO
string.body: Please choose your character's Name, Race, and Appearance.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CREATE_SERVER_INFO
string.body: Please choose a server for your character.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_MOVE_CHARACTER_CHOICE
string.body: Return to the Character Selection screen.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CREATE_SERVER_CROWDED
string.body: Server is busy. Cannot connect at this time. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_SAME_EXIST_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: That name is already in use. Please enter another.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_INVAILD_CHARACTERNAME
string.body: The name you have entered is not allowed. Please enter another name.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_CHOICE_CHARACTER_DELETE_CONFIRM
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete this character?

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_TIZERID
string.body: Traditionally famous for its mighty knights, this northern country is regarded as a powerful military state, but the barren lands and primitive state of its industries have left the country lagging furthest behind in terms of economy and wealth.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_FESRA
string.body: An eastern nation composed of several tribes, where the central government is weak and the tribal lifestyle is still maintained and emphasized. There exists agriculture and livestock farming industries based on its lush forests, but most of the produce go into feeding its citizens.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_EROLE
string.body: A nation located on the west of the Tower of Light, where the life of abstinence and celibacy is seen as ideal. A country full of devout priests of Aion, which also has the most developed economy thanks to a blessed environment.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_JUHDENIL
string.body: Developed by highly intellectual Water Elyos, this lowland country in the south boasts powerful magic and a high level of academia. It is where every Elyos who dreams of becoming a Sorcerer gathers from all over the world.

string.name: STR_LOGINSTAGE_RACE_NOT_READY
string.body: The selected Race is still being prepared.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT2
string.body: Let's use a Combo. A skill is blinking on the Quickbar. This skill is used to activate the Chain Skill. Using skills in the order indicated by the arrow allows you to defeat enemies with overwhelming striking power.

string.name: STR_HELP_CONTENT4
string.body: Let's use a special attack. Select a target and use a special attack by clicking the skill indicated by the arrow on the skill window or on the Quickbar. With the special attack assistance skill, you can also transfer your DP to any group member who uses a special attack.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_EXIST
string.body: The Game Guard is turned on. Please try again after a while or after restarting the computer.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_GAME_EXIST
string.body: The game is already loaded or the Game Guard is turned on. Please try again after exiting the game.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_INIT
string.body: Game Guard reset error. Please try again after closing other programs or restarting the computer.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_NOTFOUND
string.body: The Game Guard file was not found or corrupted. Please reinstall the Game Guard setup file.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_CRYPTOAPI
string.body: Some Windows system files are corrupted. Please reinstall Internet Explorer.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_EXECUTE
string.body: Failed to run Game Guard. Please reinstall the Game Guard setup file.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_ILLEGAL
string.body: An illegal program was detected. Please try again after closing the program.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_ABORT
string.body: The Game Guard update was canceled. If you are unable to connect to the server repeatedly, please check your Internet connection or your firewall settings.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_CONNECT
string.body: Failed to connect to the Game Guard update server. Please try again later or check your Internet connection.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_VERSION
string.body: Game Guard reset error or old version error. Please try again after reinstalling the Game Guard setup file.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_INI_ERR
string.body: The 'ini' file is not found or corrupted. Please reinstall the Game Guard setup file.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_DES_ERR
string.body: npgmup.des reset error. Please try again after deleting the Game Guard folder.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_UPDATE
string.body: Failed to connect to the Game Guard update server. Please try again later or check your firewall settings.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_AUTH
string.body: Failed to update the Game Guard. Please try again after disabling anti-virus software or adjusting the settings of your PC management program.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_SCAN
string.body: Failed to load a Game Guard module. It may be due to lack of memory or virus infection.

string.name: STR_GAMEGUARD_ERR
string.body: An error occurred while running Game Guard. Please attach all *.erl files in the GameGuard folder under the Aion folder to an email and send it to Game1@inca.co.kr.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_SELF
string.body:
This account has been suspended upon the request of the user him/herself in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies.

To reactivate your account, please send a copy of your resident registration certificate by fax (02-2186-3400).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_SELF_AUTH_EXPECTED
string.body:
As your account has not been verified with your real name, you cannot use the plaync service.

You can resume using the game service normally once you go through the personal authentication process at the plaync homepage (www.plaync.co.com).

If you have any inquiries during the personal authentication process, please try the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account requires Personal Authentication.

Please complete the personal authentication process on the plaync official website (www.plaync.com).

For more information, please use the 1:1 Petition on the plaync official website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your access to game services has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement because you made fraudulent use of someone else's mobile phone details.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement because you made fraudulent use of someone else's billing information.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services because you were confirmed to have used your account for commercial purposes.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services due to the use of illegal software.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services due to the use of illegal software.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services due to the use of illegal software.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_7
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 7 days because it was confirmed that you have attempted to engage in transactions involving cash/server/other games.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_30
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 30 days because it was confirmed that you have attempted to engage in transactions involving cash/server/other games.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services because it was confirmed that you have attempted to engage in transactions involving cash/server/other games three or more times.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_30
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 30 days because your transaction involving cash/server/other game was confirmed.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services because two or more of your transactions involving cash/server/other games were confirmed.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_AGAIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you reported a false incident or interfered with the operation of game services.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services because you were confirmed to have engaged in account trading activity.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended on the grounds of account theft.

Please check your email if you have registered the email address with your personal information, as a notification has been sent to that address.

If you are not directly involved with the account theft, please register a letter of objection to the account theft report center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com). For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync official homepage's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_LIE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with our policy on handling account theft reports because you reported a false account theft incident.

Reporting a false account theft incident to the account theft report center can cause harm to other people.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with our policy on handling account theft reports because you did not complete the personal authentication process within the grace period after an account theft report has been filed against you.

You can reactivate the account by completing the authentication process for the account theft report found at the account theft report center in the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the official homepage's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_7
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because it was confirmed that you have engaged in improper game play.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_30
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 30 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies because you were confirmed to have engaged in the speculative activities in your gameplay.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_EVER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because it was confirmed that you have engaged in improper game play.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using game services because you used an illegal software and engaged in related improper activities.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Bug abuse can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_LIGHT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Bug abuse can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_SERIOUS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Bug abuse can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_OBSTRUCT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from accessing the game because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_LANGUAGE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because it was confirmed that you have used improper language during gameplay.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM_BUT_BOT
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services due to the use of illegal software.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PRETEND_INSIDER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement because you were found to have impersonated the game master (GM), an employee of the company, or the company itself.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you were confirmed to have engaged in inappropriate gameplay.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BUNDLE
string.body:
Multiple accounts registered with your RRN (Resident Registration Number) have been suspended because it was confirmed that the accounts were in violation of the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ETC
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you were in breach of our game service agreement or operating policies.

Access to your account may be restricted if you violate the user's obligations notified through our operation policies or service agreement.

For more information about the account suspension, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_EXTERNAL_REQUEST
string.body:
Your account has been suspended by an official request from a law enforcement agency.

This action was taken because an official request from such an agency has legal implications. For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_UNPAIED
string.body:
Your account has been suspended temporarily because you have not made a payment since your last ARS mobile payment.

Please pay the outstanding amount, send us the receipt by fax (02-2186-3499) and call the customer center on 1600-0020.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DETOUR_IP
string.body:
Your account has been placed on standby awaiting personal authentication because it is suspected to have been created with someone else's identity.

If you have nothing to do with the case, press [Remove Sanction] button on the login area of the website to complete personal authentication and resume using the game service normally.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_MSG_AUTH_CONNECTION_FAIL
string.body: Cannot connect to the authorization server.

string.name: STR_SOCK_ERR_BAD_VERSION
string.body: The version of winsock.dll is not correct.

string.name: STR_CHARACTER_DELETE_OBT
string.body: Are you sure you want to delete this character?

string.name: STR_MSG_AUTO_DISCONNECTED
string.body: You have been disconnected due to being AFK for a long time.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_S_AGREE_GAME
string.body:
Your account has not been verified with your actual name.

Verify your real name at the plaync homepage (www.plaync.com) and try again.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_S_EXCEED_CONCURRENT_PLAY_LIMIT
string.body: Exceeded the maximum number of simultaneously connected accounts for a user.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_S_EXTERNAL_AUTH_BLOCKED
string.body: If you use an external account, you are blocked in the external authorization system.

string.name: STR_UI_ABYSS_USER_RANK_DEFAULT_MSG
string.body: No character has yet accumulated enough Glory Points.

string.name: STR_UI_ABYSS_LEGION_RANK_DEFAULT_MSG
string.body: No Legion has yet accumulated enough contribution points.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ALL
string.body:
New players cannot create characters on that server.
If you already have a character on that server, you may create additional characters of the same race.

string.name: STR_RACE_RESTRICT_ONE
string.body: Race creation restrictions are in place. You cannot create an %1 on the %0 server unless you already have at least one %1 character there.

string.name: STR_BLOCK_PC_ROOM_COMPLAIN
string.body:
We store your account information and connection log.
We have a report that you used the AION game service in an internet café and intentionally left without paying.
The usage of an internet café without the intention or ability to pay for the service falls under fraud according to the 347th article of the criminal law.
If you have nothing to do with the action, please contact us.
You can contact us anytime through our customer center (Tel: 1600-0020 (Korea), Aion website: https://aion.plaync.com) for more details on the accusation.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_SELF
string.body:
All game services using this account have been suspended upon your request.
For more information, call our customer center (Tel. 1600-0020).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_AUTO
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used an illegal software in the game.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_MANUAL
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used an illegal software in the game.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BOT_PERIOD
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 10 days because you used an illegal software in the game.
Your account will be permanently terminated if the same incident occurs again. For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_TRADE_ACCOUNT
string.body:
Your account was involved in an account trading. All game services using the account have been suspended.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY
string.body:
Your access to all game services provided by our company has been suspended due to fraudulent use of another's payment method.
For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_ACCOUNT_MAYBE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used another person's identity to create your account.
If you used your identity, verify your identity through the 1:1 Petition service at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_HOUSE
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you used the game service for commercial purpose.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_BOARDER
string.body:
Your account has been suspended because you regularly posted inappropriate contents that go against our service agreement and operation policy in the plaync or other game-related websites.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIOLATION
string.body:
Your account has been suspended as you were involved in an illegal activity that goes against the current law while using the plaync game services.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_COIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you were involved in an abnormal use of Toll that you can use by paying in the plaync website.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_ABUSE_FREE_COIN
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you were involved in an abnormal use of Toll that you can use by paying in the plaync website.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_BAD_PROGRAM
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you performed inappropriate activities forbidden by the plaync service in order to obtain undisclosed information or alter our game client.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_VIRUS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operation policy because you were involved in the use or distribution of illegal software that can harm our services, other companies' services, or users' computers.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_NAME
string.body:
Your account has been suspended in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement because you used another person's identity to create your account.
For more information, contact our customer center at the plaync website (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_LOGIN_ERROR_EXCEED_MAX_CHAR_COUNT
string.body: You have exceeded the number of characters allowed per account, and must delete some characters before you can play. If you have transferred to a different server, please try logging in on the previous server, and then again on the new server.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BOT_PROGRAM
string.body:
Your account has been placed on standby awaiting personal authentication to ensure a safe gaming experience and to protect your account.

To resume using the game service normally, visit our homepage and complete the personal authentication process.

Please complete the personal authentication process first on the plaync homepage (www.plaync.com).

string.name: STR_MSG_ERROR_REPORT_SEND_AGREE
string.body:
Send an error report of the Aion client automatically to the NCSOFT's error reporting server?

An error report contains information on the status of Aion, hardware configuration and other data at the time of error. The error report may contain personal information, but is not used by NCSOFT.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHFAILED
string.body: The authentication number is incorrect. Please check the number once again.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_IVRNOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Telephone authentication service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHTIMEOUT
string.body: The input time for the ARS number has expired.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_PHONENOTAVAILABLE
string.body: The telephone authentication service is unavailable as there is no phone connection or the line is busy. Please try again after moving to where there is phone connection or hanging up the phone.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_INVALIDCUSTOMERINFO
string.body: The telephone number is incorrect. Please check your registration information.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_NOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Telephone authentication service is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_TOOBUSY2
string.body: The telephone authentication service is currently unavailable due to a high customer demand. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_NOTPAID
string.body: Telephone authentication service period has expired. Please try again after you have paid for the service.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHBLOCKEDTEMP
string.body: Telephone authentication service is blocked due to repeated telephone authentication failures. Please try again later.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_CALLLIMITEXCEEDED
string.body: You have exceeded the number of times you can use the telephone authentication service in one day.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_NCTASD_AUTHALREADYINPROCESS
string.body:
To improve security measures, telephone verification for new registrations will be suspended from March 28, 2018

The telephone registration service will end on November 21st, 2018.

Please use the new and secure NC verification or the OTP service!

To sign-up for the service, visit the plaync homepage (www.plaync.com) > My Page.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_MORE_GAME
string.body: You cannot run any more client.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_FOR_RESTRICTED_NATION
string.body: You have limited access and the connection with the server is being closed.

string.name: STR_OPTION_AV_INFO_VSYNC
string.body: The client must be restarted to apply the selected setting.\nTurning it on reduces the screen distortion in full screen mode.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_PCINFO_INVALID_REGISTER_PC
string.body: This computer has not subscribed to the PC registration service.

string.name: STR_NCTASD_AUTH_STARTED
string.body:
To improve security measures, telephone verification for new registrations will be suspended from March 28, 2018

The telephone registration service will end on November 21st, 2018.

Please use the new and secure NC verification or the OTP service!

To sign-up for the service, visit the plaync homepage (www.plaync.com) > My Page.

string.name: STR_USER_KICKED_BY_TIMEOUT
string.body: Connection has timed out. Please take a break.

string.name: STR_CAPTCHA_CONTENT
string.body:
You were poisoned during extraction, and are currently unable to extract.

To recover to the original state, you need to chant spells to purify the poision.

Enter the spells you see below in the correct order.

string.name: STR_CAPTCHA_REMAIN_CHANCE_AND_TIME
string.body: Attempts remaining: <font color="%0">%1?</font> Time remaining: <font color="%2">%DURATIONTIME3</font>

string.name: STR_ECARD_ENTER
string.body: Please enter the Security Card number corresponding to three coordinates.

string.name: STR_ECARD_GAME_OVER
string.body: You failed the Security Card Authentication and the game is shutting down.

string.name: STR_ECARD_ENTER_INVALID
string.body: You entered the wrong number. You have %num0 attempts left.

string.body: There are <font color="ff0000">unread messages</font> selected. Do you really wish to delete them all?

string.name: STR_MAIL_CONFIRM_DEL_ALL_SELECTED_MAIL
string.body: This deletes all selected mail. Do you really wish to delete them all?

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_NO_ADMIN
string.body: You need administrator authority to run nProtect KeyCrypt.

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_VERIFY_VERSION
string.body: You are using Windows XP compatibility mode. You must restart the program to run nProtect KeyCrypt.

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_PS2LOGGER
string.body: A PS/2 key logger has been detected.

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_USBLOGGER
string.body: An attempt to hack the USB keyboard driver has been detected.

string.name: STR_KEYCRYPT_HHDUSBH
string.body: A HHD monitoring tool has been detected.

string.name: STR_SECURITYCARD_ENTER
string.body: Please enter the password for the Security Card No, [%num0].

string.name: STR_SECURITYCARD_ENTER_INVAILD
string.body: You failed the Security Card Authentication and the game is shutting down.

string.name: STR_SECURITYCARD_GAME_OVER
string.body: You have failed several times to enter the correct security card number, so your password has expired. Please change your password on the official NCSOFT website (www.http://us.ncsoft.com/support).

string.name: STR_KICK_BOT_AUTO
string.body: An illegal program has been detected. Closing the game.

string.name: E_NCTASD_AUTHENTICATIONFAILED
string.body:
Authentication failed because you didn't enter the correct (or any) authentication number.

If you fail three consecutive times, your account will be blocked for 30 minutes.

string.name: E_NCTASD_IVRNOTAVAILABLE
string.body: The telephone authentication service is temporarily unavailable due to a problem with the telecommunication company. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_AUTHENTICATIONTIMEOUT
string.body: The transmission is being delayed due to a problem with the telecommunication company. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_PHONENOTAVAILABLE
string.body: Authentication failed because the line is engaged or the call is not being answered. Please try again later.

string.name: E_NCTASD_INVALIDCUSTOMERINFO
string.body:

string.name: STR_ITEM_SEAL_CONFIRM
string.body:
If you seal an item, you cannot trade, sell, destroy, enhance, extract, store (in account warehouse or legion warehouse), modify the appearance of, or soul-bind the item.

You will be restricted in using consumable items.

You can unseal the item by using a Seal Removal Scroll . If you use a Seal Breaker, it takes 7 days to unseal completely.

Are you sure you want to %0% seal?

string.name: STR_ITEM_SEAL_CONFIRM_UNSEALING_START
string.body: You have requested to unseal %0. The seal will be completely removed after 7 days. You can unseal a maximum of 3 items. Do you really want to unseal %0?

string.name: STR_ITEM_SEAL_CONFIRM_UNSEAL
string.body: %0 will be unsealed. Do you really want to unseal it?

string.name: STR_ITEM_SEAL_SEALED_ITEM_DESC
string.body: Since it is sealed, you cannot enhance, modify, extract, trade, or soulbind it.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_AKS_ENTER_PK_SERVER
string.body: This game area is a free PK area. Abide by the rules and you will have a great gaming experience.

string.name: STR_NOTICE_MIXED_RACED_AFTER_SERVER_MERGE
string.body:
Aion was designed for players to play only one race per server. We have allowed you to play both Elyos and Asmodians on the same server due to a merging of servers on which your characters were located.


While you will be able to play your existing characters, you will be unable to create new characters on this server until you have only characters of the same race on the server.

1. To resolve the issue, transfer any characters of the opposite race to another server using a paid server transfer. Alternatively, delete all characters of one race. For additional information about paid server transfers please visit http://na.aiononline.com/en/store/account-services/.

2. Once only one race remains on the server, you will be able to create new characters of that race. You will not be able to create characters of the opposing race.

Thank you for your understanding.

Type OK to continue.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_PC_CARE

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_PET_CARE_UNDER_CONDITION

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FATIGUE_BODY
string.body: Your Fatigue has increased. If your Fatigue is full, you can earn only limited XP, Abyss Points, and items.\nYou do not accumulate Fatigue while in a big city or fortress or while you are in Private Store mode. Fatigue is reset to '0' every day at 6 AM.\nYou can completely recover from fatigue by clicking the Fatigue Recovery button. The Fatigue Recovery available is reset every Wednesday after the regular checkup.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FATIGUE_STATE_RECOVER_FATIGUE_BODY
string.body: You have recovered from Fatigue. The Fatigue Recovery available is reset every Wednesday after the regular checkup.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_FATIGUE_STATE_RECOVER_CONFIRM
string.body: Your remaining uses of Fatigue Recovery is %0. Uses will be reset every Wednesday after the regular checkup. Are you sure you wish to use Fatigue Recovery?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FATIGUE_STATE_BODY
string.body: Your Fatigue is full. You can only earn limited XP, Abyss Points, and items.\nFatigue is reset every day at 6 AM. You can completely recover from fatigue by clicking the Fatigue Recovery button.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
[New Group/Alliance Entry] Organize a new group/alliance, create an Instanced Zone, and enter.

[Quick Group/Alliance Entry] Search for a new group/alliance and, at the same time, search for an available spot in an existing group/alliance. However, you cannot enter an Instanced Zone after a certain period of time has elapsed since its creation.

[Leveling Range]

▶ Fire Temple: Level 31 - 39

▶ Esoterrace: Level 40 - 48

▶ Beshmundir Temple: Level 49 - 57

▶ Rentus Base: Level 58 - 66

▶ Tiamat Stronghold: Level 67 - 75

※ If you cannot enter again after leveling up, try finding an entrance on the field and enter with a group.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PVP_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
This Instance allows you to compete with another character until the time runs out.

Each training match consists of a maximum of 3 rounds, but it can end before that if you reach the time limit, or if one player accrues the winning number of points.

If you enter the Instance, all Enchant effects currently affecting you will be removed.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_SCROLL_CONFIRM

You chose to augment %1 to level %2 by spending %0.

You can only augment up to the item's maximum augment level allowed.

Continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_SCROLL_CONFIRM
string.body:
You chose to augment all eligible equipped items up to Level %1 by spending %0.

You can only augment up to the item's maximum augment level allowed.

Continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM
string.body: Pay %ap0 to augment charge all equipped items to their maximum levels. Do you really want to augment them?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS
string.body:
You chose to augment the registered item to Level %0.

You can only augment up to the item's maximum augment level allowed.

This will cost %ap1. Continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_USER_RANKDOWN_CONFIRM
string.body: If you charge the item with magical power, your Abyss rank may drop on the next charging.

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap0 to augment all equipped items to the maximum level.

If the items charge, your Abyss Rank will drop. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap1 to augment the registered item to Level %0 or its maximum level, whichever is lower.

If the item charges, your Abyss Rank will drop. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_ALL_CONFIRM_USER_RANKDOWN
string.body:
You need %qina0 to augment all the equipped items to their maximum levels.

If the items charge, your Abyss Rank may drop next time. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_ITEM_CHARGE2_CONFIRM_CHARGE_ALL_ITEMS_USER_RANKDOWN
string.body:
Pay %ap1 to augment the registered item to Level %0 or its maximum level, whichever is lower.

If the item charges, your Abyss Rank may drop next time. Do you want to continue?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_FATIGUE_AUTH_CONFIRM
string.body: The Fatigue Penalty is applied because you have either entered the incorrect personal information or failed to enter any information. If you click the Yes button, you can enter the correct information. If you click the No button, you get to play the game with the Fatigue Penalty.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_FIRST_OVERDUE_MAIL_HEADER
string.body: Hello, this is a notice from the House Administration.\n\nYou have an unpaid maintenance fee.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_FIRST_OVERDUE_MAIL_BODY
string.body: \n\nNote that your %2% will be impunded according to the housing management policy unless you pay the maintenance fee by %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_SECOND_OVERDUE_MAIL_BODY

string.name: STR_HOUSING_FINAL_OVERDUE_MAIL_HEADER

string.name: STR_HOUSING_FINAL_OVERDUE_MAIL_BODY
string.body:
You have an unpaid maintenance fee. According to the housing management policy, %2% will be impounded.

You can re-buy the impounded house from the auction.

Thank you for taking good care of %2% so far.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_DISRUPT_GAME_PLAY_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 3 days because it was confirmed that you have misused the game system to disrupt the normal game service.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_PLAY_ABNORMAL_7_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game. Bug abuse can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

After infiltration, you will automatically be withdrawn from the existing group/force

string.body:
You entered the time and space defense area infiltrated by the opposing race.

Do you want to join the time and space defense group/force?

You will be automatically withdrawn from the time and space defense group/force once you move outside the time and space defense area.

string.name: STR_IDARENA_TEAM_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
In this Instance, you will compete with other teams until the time limit.

Each match consists of a maximum of 3 rounds. If the time runs out, or one player wins, the training will be over.

Once you enter, all enchantment effects on you will be removed.

string.name: STR_INVADE_DIRECT_POTAL_RESURRECT

Press the OK button and you will resurrect immediately at the Time and Space Battle Bind Point.

You can resurrect someone else on the spot within %0 minutes.

If the Time Space is closed, you can resurrect in the resurrection bind point.

Resurrection Wait Time: 10 sec (%1 sec remaining)

string.name: STR_LEGIONBONUSBUFF_01
string.body: The concurrent users in the legion exceed 5, so the Legion Unity benefit I is currently active. EXP acquisition is increased when gathering, crafting, or hunting.

string.body: %0 has expired and is unavailable.\n To continue to use it, activate it in the cabinet or inventory again.\n

string.name: STR_SECURITYSERVICEBUFF_01
string.body: The Security Service is currently applied to your account, so you receive the privilege of secure access. %0 and %1 increase.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: Thank you for your part in helping the Elyos take %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you are awarded as follows:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_HEADER_DARK
string.body: Thank you for your part in helping the Asmodians take %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_DARK
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you are awarded as follows:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: Thank you for your part in the occupation of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: As a reward for your participation in the battle, we would like to grant you the following:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_HEADER_DARK
string.body: Thank you for your part in the occupation of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_DARK
string.body: As a reward for your participation in the battle, we would like to grant you the following:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: Thank you for your part in your Legion's successful defense of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: As a reward for your participation in the battle, we would like to grant you the following:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_HEADER_DARK
string.body: Thank you for your part in your Legion's successful defense of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_BODY_DARK
string.body: As a reward for your participation in the battle, we would like to grant you the following:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: Thank you for your part in the successful defense of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you are awarded as follows:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_HEADER_DARK
string.body: Thank you for your part in the successful defense of %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENDER_BODY_DARK
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you are awarded as follows:

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: The Elyos have successfully defended %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nWe encourage you to continue to do your best to defend this fortress.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_HEADER_DARK
string.body: The Asmodians have successfully defended %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_EMPTY_BODY_DARK
string.body: \n\nWe encourage you to continue to do your best to defend this fortress.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: The Elyos have successfully defended %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_BODY_LIGHT
string.body:
However, very few warriors aided in the defense, and our forces have suffered heavy casualties. Therefore, we must use all the spoils of war to repair the fortress, and there will be no rewards issued for this battle.

We encourage all Daevas to participate proactively in the defense from now on.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_HEADER_DARK
string.body: The Asmodians have successfully defended %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_FAIL_BODY_DARK
string.body:
However, very few warriors aided in the defense, and our forces have suffered heavy casualties. Therefore, we must use all the spoils of war to repair the fortress, and there will be no rewards issued for this battle.

We encourage all Daevas to participate proactively in the defense from now on.

Click the UI Position Change/Fix Status Padlock on the left side of the Quickbar to change the indicator's position.

string.body: [Notice] The new [@ncmsg:%0; News] has been registered.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ESSENTIAL_DESC
string.body: - Essential data that allows basic gameplay. PC is level-restricted.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_ESSENTIAL_DESC
string.body: - Removes all level and zone restrictions.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_OBJECT_DESC
string.body: - Allows a variety of low level costumes.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_OBJECT_DESC
string.body: - Allows a variety of costumes of all levels.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_MUSIC_DESC
string.body: - Plays background music in the beginner areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_MUSIC_DESC
string.body: - Plays background music in all areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_L10N_DESC
string.body: - Plays NPC dialog and cutscene audio in the beginner areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_L10N_DESC
string.body: - Plays NPC dialog and cutscene audio in all areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_SOUND_VOICE_DESC
string.body: - Improves voice sound effect clarity during combat.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_SOUND_ETC_DESC
string.body: - You can hear some of the pets, cutscenes and ambient noises.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_SOUND_ETC_DESC
string.body: - Plays all pet, cutscene, and ambient audio.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ENV_DESC
string.body: - Allows high-quality colors and brightness in the beginner areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_2_ENV_DESC
string.body: - Allows high-quality colors and brightness in all areas.

string.name: STR_LITE__TOOLTIP_1_ETC_DESC
string.body: - You can play in all areas.

string.name: STR_ASK_REMOVE_BINDSTONE

Reinstallation will remove all previously applied Kisk.

string.name: STR_IDKAMAR_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
In this instance, Elyos and Asmodians battle each other until the time expires.

Score points using chariots and supplies, and the side wth the most points is the winner.

Upon entering, all of your enchantment effects disappear.

string.name: STR_HOUSING_MODE_PARTS_CONFIRM_DEFAULT
string.body: You may choose an item for basic conversion. Click OK to convert the item to a basic item.

string.name: STR_PACK_ITEM_DO_YOU_PACK
string.body:
Do you want to wrap %0?

Wrapping %0 enables you to trade it, register it for sale on the broker or private store, and send it as a mail attachment once.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Under_01_War_MATCH_DESC

Wage war against the opposing faction until time expires.

Occupying a base earns you points. The race that scores the most points wins.

If you enter, all Boost effects applied to you will disappear.

Wage war against the opposing faction until time expires.

The race that scores the most points wins.

If you enter, all Boost effects applied to you will disappear.

string.body:
Do you want to use %0 and reset the tempering of %1?

The temperance level of %1 remains the same, but its status will be reset.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_OPTION
string.body: Do you want to tune the option of %0?

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_PREVIEW_OPTION
string.body: This is the result of tuning the options for %0.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_INFO
string.body:
You may view the results in an additional window and decide whether to apply the results or not.

Regardless of your decision, one of your available number of tunings will be deducted, and your tuned item will also be consumed.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_OPTION_INFO
string.body:
You may view the results in an additional window, but you cannot undo it.

Your remaining number of tunings will remain unchanged.

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_REIDENTIFY_PREVIEW_INFO
string.body: Even if you choose not to apply the results, your remaining number of tunings and tuned items won't be recovered.

string.name: STR_REGISTER_ITEM_UPGRADE_DIALOG__DESC
string.body:
Register an item you want to improve.

The item can be improved if it meets the enhancement level and the material item conditions.

During the promotion, excluding the two-handed weapon combination information, all enchantment level, Manastone Socketing, and tuning information will be reset.

To view the before/after improvement comparison and results in the tooltip, select the Result Item on the bottom right.

string.name: STR_GLOBAL_OPTION_DIALOG__NCPING_USER_AGREE
string.body:
NC Ping is a function that edits the set value of the operating system (registry) to improve communications between the Aion game client and server.

This function improves response times during the game.

However, if the NC Ping function is activated and Aion is being played, other programs can suffer in their network performance or even shut down.

Please refer to the NC Ping option explanation for more information.

string.name: STR_LDF5_F_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_HEADER_LIGHT
string.body: We Elyos have achieved an overwhelming victory in siege warfare for occupying %2 at %1 on %0.

string.name: STR_LDF5_F_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_OCCUPY_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: \n\nAs a reward for your %0-level achievement during the battle, you are awarded as follows:

string.name: STR_LDF5_F_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_LIGHT
string.body: you are awarded the included bounty./n/nFaith and arms!

string.name: STR_LDF5_F_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_DEFENSE_BODY_DARK

string.name: STR_LDF5_F_ABYSS_REWARD_MAIL_PROTECT_BODY_LIGHT

Use it wisely in continuing your mission.

Faith and arms!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_STOP_BUTTON
string.body: Press Reward to receive a prize\ncorresponding to the Upgrade Level.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_RETRY_BUTTON
string.body: Press Resume to continue upgrading.\nMay be used only once per play.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_RETRY_CONFIRM
string.body:
You can retry the game from the last failed stage by consuming %num1 %0.

If you retry and fail again, you will obtain the reward from where you retried.

Do you want to proceed?

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_UPGRADE_NEED_ENCHANT
string.body: Promotion allowed for promotion level %0 or above

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GACHA_REWARD_BUTTON
string.body: Press Reward to receive a prize\ncorresponding to the Upgrade Level.

string.name: STR_POPUP_GACHA_FEVERTIME_CHECK
string.body:
Shugo Luck Time has started.

Greater luck is waiting for you.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GAME
string.body:
Upgrade Arcade

The Upgrade Arcade is easy and fun to play! Upgrade the weapon with 1 Arcade Token. The more you upgrade it, the higher grade reward you will receive!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_LUCKY
string.body:
Frenzy Meter

As you use Arcade Tokens, your Frenzy Meter fills until...

Upgrade Frenzy!

When you reach 100 Frenzy Points, Frenzy mode will activate! Frenzy mode features an enhanced prize list, but only lasts for a brief amount of time, so be quick!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_FAILURE
string.body:
Upgrade Failure

When an upgrade fails, you receive the lowest grade reward, so be careful!

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_BUTTON
string.body:
The Play and Reward Buttons

Press Play to upgrade the weapon. When you are satisfied with the Upgrade Level, press Reward to receive your prize.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_RETRY
string.body:
Resume

You can use Arcade Tokens to press Resume once per Play to restore your last successful Upgrade Level. The higher the Upgrade Level being restored, the more Upgrade Tokens it will take.

string.name: STR_GACHA_EXPLANATION_GRADE
string.body:
Rewards Panel

Click the arrow next to Rewards to reveal the prizes you can win. There are four possible grades. The higher Upgrade Level you attain, the better grade reward you will receive. Click Frenzy Rewards to reveal the prizes reserved for Upgrade Frenzy!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ACTION_PET_PETBUFF
string.body: Feed your pet Aether Cherries when it wears out to continue its cheering. Its appetite determines how many it needs.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ABSOLUTEEXP_BODY
string.body: Recharged Golden Apple Scent. Gain additional %0%% XP. This effect cannot be reused after all XP has been consumed.Allows up to %num1 XP to be accumulated.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_ITEM_DO_YOU_WANT_ENCHANT_ITEM_WARNNING_02
string.body: If enchanting fails, the enchantment stage is lowered to Stage %0 and the item reverts to Pre-Amplification Status..

string.name: STR_COMPOUNDED_ITEM_DELETE_SKILL
string.body: Buff skill imbued to %1 will disappear.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ABUSE_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 90 days because you abused system loopholes and/or bugs or engaged in related activity in the game.

Bug abuse can bring serious interruption of service and destroy the game balance.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 90 days in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, you can submit an objection form available at the plaync (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_180_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 180 days in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, you can submit an objection form available at the plaync (www.plaync.co.kr) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ATTEMPTED_FRAUD_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 90 days in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_7
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 7 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies because you were confirmed to have engaged in the speculative activities in your gameplay.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_GAMBLE_90
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 90 days in accordance with the terms and conditions of our service agreement and operating policies because you were confirmed to have engaged in the speculative activities in your gameplay.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_UNFAIR_PROFITS_3_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 3 days because it was confirmed that you have resorted to abnormal play to obtain EXP, AP, GP, and/or cashable goods, which is against our overall gameplay direction.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_TRADE_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended from using all game services for 90 days because your transaction involving cash/server/other game was confirmed.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BREAK_DEAL_7_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 7 days because you were confirmed to have obtained items in an inappropriate manner, which is against the previously-consented item distribution method during a group play.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_BREAK_DEAL_90_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 90 days because you were confirmed to have obtained items in an inappropriate manner, which is against the previously-consented item distribution method during a group play.

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_30_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 30 days in accordance with our operating policies because you committed an act that obstructs public safety or goes against social order (fraud).

For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_CHANGE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_ADD_SKILL
string.body:
Modifying the appearance of %0 to %1 requires %num2.

The %4 skill bestowed on %1 is bestowed on %0.

Once the extraction is done, %1 will be destroyed.

string.name: STR_CHANGE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_CHANGE_SKILL
string.body:
Modifying the appearance of %0 to %1 requires %num2.

The skill %3 is changed to the skill %4.

If the appearance is removed, you can use %3 again.

Once the extraction is done, %1 will be destroyed.

string.name: STR_UNDO_SKIN_CHANGE_CONFIRM_DELETE_SKILL
string.body:
To remove the appearance modification effect of %0 you need %num1.

If you remove the changed appearance effect, the skill %3 will be deleted.

Restore the original appearance?

string.name: STR_UNDO_SKIN_CHANGE_CONFIRM_REABLE_BASE_SKILL
string.body:
To remove the appearance modification effect of %0 you need %num1.

If you remove the changed appearance effect, you can use the skill %2 again.

Restore the original appearance?

string.name: STR_UNDO_SKIN_CHANGE_CONFIRM_ROLLBACK_SKILL
string.body:
To remove the appearance modification effect of %0 you need %num1.

If you remove the changed appearance effect, the skill %3 will be changed to %2.

Restore the original appearance?

string.name: STR_CHANGE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_DELETE_SKILL
string.body:
Modifying the appearance of %0 to %1 requires %num2.

The skill %3 is deleted.

If the appearance is removed, you can use %3 again.

Once the extraction is done, %1 will be destroyed.

string.name: STR_MOVE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_ADD_SKILL
string.body:
The appearance of %1 will be transferred to %0.

The %4 skill bestowed to %1 will be bestowed to %0.

Only the appearance of %1 is extracted, it will not be destroyed.

string.name: STR_MOVE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_DELETE_SKILL
string.body:
The appearance of %1 will be transferred to %0.

The skill %3 will be deleted.

If the appearance is removed, you can use %3 again.

Only the appearance of %1 will be extracted but it will not be destroyed.

string.name: STR_MOVE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_CHANGE_SKILL
string.body:
The appearance of %1 will be transferred to %0.

The skill %3 will be changed to %4.

If the appearance is removed, you can use %3 again.

Only the appearance of %1 will be extracted but it will not be destroyed.

string.name: STR_CHANGE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_DELETE_SKILL_02
string.body:
Modifying the appearance of %0 to %1 requires %num2.

%3 will be deleted.

After %1 is extracted, it will be destroyed.

string.name: STR_CHANGE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_CHANGE_SKILL_02
string.body:
Modifying the appearance of %0 to %1 requires %num2.

%3 change to %4.

After %1 is extracted, it will be destroyed.

string.name: STR_MOVE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_DELETE_SKILL_02
string.body:
The appearance of %1 will be transferred to %0.

The skill %3 will be deleted.

The appearance of %1 will only be extracted, not destroyed.

string.name: STR_MOVE_ITEM_SKIN_CONFIRM_CHANGE_SKILL_02
string.body:
The appearance of %1 will be transferred to %0.

The skill %3 will be changed to %4.

Only the appearance of %1 is extracted. It is not destroyed.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_BUFF_DESC
string.body: Topping is active and you are receiving its buff.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_BASE_01_DESC
string.body: Increases HP by 160 and raises the item drop rate in instanced dungeons by 10%.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_BASE_02_DESC
string.body: Increases HP by 320 and raises the item drop rate in instanced dungeons by 20%.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_PHYSICAL_DAMAGE_01_DESC
string.body: Physical Attack increases by 80 and Physical Defense by 30.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_PHYSICAL_ACCURACY_01_DESC
string.body: Increases accuracy by 280 and evasion by 140.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_MAGICAL_DAMAGE_01_DESC
string.body: Increases magic attack by 80 and magical defense by 30.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_MAGICAL_ACCURACY_01_DESC
string.body: Increases Magic Accuracy by 280 and magic resistance by 140.

string.name: STR_TOPPING_APBOOST_01_DESC
string.body: Increases the Abyss Points gained from defeating the opposing race by 20%.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_SLAYER_LIGHT_G3_BODY

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_GUARD_LIGHT_G1_BODY

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_ATTACKDELAY
string.body: Attacking speed. Lower values equal faster attack speeds.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYATTACK
string.body: Intensity of weapon attacks. Greater numbers equal more Weapon Damage.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGATTACK
string.body: Intensity of weapon attacks. Greater numbers equal more Weapon Damage.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_HITACCURACY
string.body: Probability that physical attacks hit a target. Higher probability equals a lower chance of the opposing target evading, parrying, or executing block.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_CRITICAL
string.body: Probability of inflicting critical attacks. The chance for critical hits increases by %0%%.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGBOOST
string.body: Ability to boost the power of Magic Attacks. Greater numbers equal more powerful Magic Attacks.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGACCURACY
string.body: Probability of magic attacks hitting a target. Greater numbers equal a lower chance of the target resisting magic attacks.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGCRITICAL
string.body: Probability of inflicting critical Magic Attacks. The chance for critical hits increases by %0%%.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STA_HEAL_BOOST
string.body: Ability to boost the power of HP recovery skills. Greater numbers equal more powerful recovery skills.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_CASTINGTIME
string.body: Speed of casting magic. Lower values equal faster casting speeds.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYDEFEND
string.body: Defense against physical attacks. Greater numbers equal a reduction in damage received.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_BLOCK
string.body: Chance of blocking incoming attacks with a shield. You have a %1%% chance to block attacks from an enemy with an Accuracy of %0, with your shield.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PARRY
string.body: Chance of blocking incoming attacks with a weapon. You have a %1%% chance to block attacks from an enemy with an Accuracy of %0, with your weapon.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_DODGE
string.body: Chance of evading physical attacks. You have a %1%% chance to evade attacks from an enemy with an Accuracy of %0.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_REDUCE_RATE
string.body: Chance of avoiding critical hits. Greater numbers equal a higher chance to evade critical hits.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_REDUCE
string.body: Physical Crit Defense The higher the value, the lower the attacker's Physical Crit Damage will be.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_NEW_DEFENCE
string.body: Probability of resisting Magic Attacks. You have a %1%% chance to resist enemy attacks with a Magic Accuracy of %0.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_SKILL_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Defense against magic attacks. Greater numbers equal a reduction in magic damage received.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGDEFEND
string.body: Degree of offsetting the target's magic skill boosting power. Greater numbers equal a reduction in the attacker's magic skill boosting power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_REDUCE_RATE
string.body: Probability of avoiding critical magic attacks. Greater numbers equal a higher chance to avoid critical magic attacks.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_REDUCE
string.body: Magic Crit Defense The higher the value, the lower the attacker's Magic Crit Damage will be.

string.body: [%gchar:warn_attr_adj] You did not meet the recommended level, so only some of the basic/optional stats will apply (%0%%).

string.name: STR_SEARCH_GUILD_JOIN_CONFIRM_DESC
string.body:
Do you want to apply to join %0 legion?

After joining a legion, you can neither create a legion nor join another for 24 hours.

string.name: STR_CONFIRM_LEAVE_GUILD
string.body:
Do you want to leave this legion to delete the character associated with the legion?

(Even if you cancel the request while your character is waiting to be deleted, your request to leave the legion will be processed.)

string.name: STR_CONFIRM_CANCEL_APPLY_JOIN_GUILD
string.body:
Do you want to cancel the application to join this legion to delete the character that will join this one?

(Even if you cancel the request while your character is waiting to be deleted, your application to join the legion will be processed.)

string.name: STR_SUCCESS_LEAVE_GUILD
string.body: You have successfully withdrawn from the legion.

string.name: STR_SUCCESS_CANCEL_APPLY_JOIN_GUILD
string.body: You have successfully canceled your legion application.

string.name: STR_FAIL_LEAVE_GUILD
string.body:
Failed to process the request to withdraw from this legion.

Please try again.

string.name: STR_FAIL_CANCEL_APPLY_JOIN_GUILD
string.body:
Failed to process the request to cancel the application to join this legion.

Please try again.

string.name: STR_GUILD_DISPERSE_STAYMODE_CANCEL_3
string.body: You cannot delete a character who owns a house. Please sell the house and try again.

string.name: STR_GUILD_DISPERSE_STAYMODE_CANCEL_4
string.body: You cannot delete a Legion Brigade General. Please try again after disbanding the legion.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_EXP_BOOST_DESC
string.body: Growth Aura is active. While the effect lasts, EXP gained from hunting, gathering or crafting increases by %0%%. When your Growth Aura is depleted, the effect also disappears.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT
string.body: •PvP Enchantment stones can increase the enchantment levels of items that can be enchanted. When an item's enchantment level increases, its attributes also increase. The success rate will increase with the type of materials and the Enchant Supplement you are using.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •Items that can reach Breakthrough can also be enchanted. The item's stats increase if the enchant level increases.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •Items that can socket manastones can increase an item's abilities through manastone socketing.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_PROC
string.body: •Add special effects to your attacks by imbuing a weapon with the power of a godstone.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_AUTHORIZE
string.body: •Use tempering solution to temper a variety of equipment types, increasing their attributes.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_POLISH
string.body: •Temporarily imbue a weapon with added stats using the power of Idian. The effect lasts until the Idian runs out.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY
string.body: •Retuning allows to redistribute stats of pieces of equipment that were randomly imbued with attributes.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_CHARGE
string.body: •Charges an item with DP or MP. Charge level varies on the material used.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_EXTRACT
string.body: •Extracts Manastone Fasteners or promotion materials from an item. The item disappears after extraction.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_AP_EXTRACT
string.body: •Extracts Abyss Points from an item, consuming it in the process.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_PACK
string.body: •Packaging allows non-tradable and non-selling items to be traded or sold. A packaged item may be traded or sold once.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT
string.body: •Place the item to be enchanted in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •Place the item to be omega enchanted in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •Place the item to be modified in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_PROC
string.body: •Place the item to be modified in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_AUTHORIZE
string.body: •Place the item to temper in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_POLISH
string.body: •Place the item to imbue Idian with in the Idian Addition Target slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_REIDENTIFY
string.body: •Place the item to retune in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_CHARGE
string.body: •Place the item to charge with Augment/Conditioning in the Augment/Conditioning Target slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_EXTRACT
string.body: •Place the item to extract in the Equipment Extraction Target slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_AP_EXTRACT
string.body: •Place the item to be converted into Abyss Points in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_DYE
string.body: •Place the item to be dyed in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_PACK
string.body: •Place the item to be wrapped in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_SEAL
string.body: •Place the item to seal in the "Target Item" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_UNSEAL
string.body: •Place the item to remove the seal in the Seal Removal Target slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT
string.body: •Place the desired enchantment stone in the "Enchantment Stone" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_EXCEED_ENCHANT
string.body: •Place the desired omega enchanting stone in the "Omega Stone" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT_OPTION
string.body: •Archdaevas can use exclusive Manastones below level %0 as material, except Ancient Manastones. Place the material item to use for manastone socketing in the Manastone Socketing Material slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_PROC
string.body: •Place the desired godstone in the "Godstone" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_AUTHORIZE
string.body: •Place the desired tempering solution in the "Tempering Solution" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_POLISH
string.body: •Can charge Idian below level %0. Place the material item for the Idian charge into the Add Idian material slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_REIDENTIFY
string.body: •Place the retuning scroll in the "Tuning Scroll" slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_CHARGE

string.body:
Ophidan Warpath is a place where the Elyos and the Asmodians wage war until the time limit expires.

Transform into Shugos and obtain Mechanical Weapon Test Parts to score points. The team with the most points when time expires wins.

If you enter the Instance, all Boost effects applied to you will disappear.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_Fortress_War_MATCH_DESC
string.body:
Idgel Dome is a place where the Elyos and the Asmodians wage war until the time limit expires.

If you enter the Instance, all Boost effects applied to you will disappear.
