string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_REMOVE_OPTION
string.body: *Set the manastone removal item in manastone removal target slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REMOVE_OPTION
string.body: *You can remove manastones socketed in items. The removed manastones cannot be restored.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_COMPOUND_WEAPON
string.body: *Set the desired weapon in the combination slot. When combining a weapon that was already been combined, the old combination effect will disappear.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_COMPOUND_WEAPON
string.body: *Set the desired weapon for extraction in the combination material slot. The recommended level for the weapon that is used as material needs to be lower than that of the target weapon.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_COMPOUND_WEAPON
string.body: *Combines a two-handed weapon of the same type and bestows the target weapon with the material weapon's manastone slots, charge Divinity/Magical Power stats, additional stats, and some attack and magic boosting stats. The weapon used as material is destroyed.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_COMPOUND_WEAPON_TRADE
string.body: Cannot be stored in the account/legion warehouse or sold after combination

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_COMPOUND_WEAPON_CHARGE_AP

string.body: Bestows a %0 Conditioning effect of the combination material after the combination

This is a 6 on 6 battle in which at total of 16 teams can participate.

The winner from the Golden Arena will proceed to the next match.

Once a winning team is determined, the battle ends and rewards are distributed according to the final ranking.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_EVENT_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
This is a 6 on 6 battle in which at total of 16 teams can participate.

The winner from the Golden Arena will proceed to the next match.

Once a winning team is determined, the battle ends and rewards are distributed according to the final ranking.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_RELAY_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
This is a 1 on 1 relay battle in which at total of 16 teams can participate.

The winning team from the Golden Arena group battle will proceed to the next match.

Once a winning team is determined, the battle ends and rewards are distributed according to the final ranking.

It does not roll the Golden Dice or collect prizes.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: •Use a Manastone Fastener on an item with a Manastone socket to expand its slots.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TARGET_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: •Put the item for the Manastone slot expansion into the respective slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: •Place the material for retuning in the respective slot.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body:
•You can expand Manastone slots for equipment.

•After expanding Manastone slots, you can socket Manastones.

•If you are successful, the number of Manastone slots becomes %0 → %1.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD_WARNING
string.body: If you fail, the Manastone Fastener will be expended

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_SUCCEEDED_ENCHANT_OPTIONSLOT_ADD
string.body: Manastone Slot Expansion Successful

string.name: STR_RESURRECT_QUNA_DESC
string.body: Use %0[%gchar:luna] to resurrect at your current location and fully restore your HP and MP.\nSoul Sickness will not apply. Divine Soul Healing restores the number of times this can be used.

string.name: STR_INGAMESHOP_NOT_ENOUGH_QUAN
string.body: You don't have enough Luna.\n (Current Balance:%0[%gchar:luna])

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDF7_weapon_B
string.body: Shows how often you can operate the door.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_ENCHANT_HOME
string.body: •If you register equipment, the enchant/remodel menu is activated on the left.

string.name: STR_INGAME_POPUP_DAY_CHECK_TV
string.body: Close this popup for the day

string.name: STR_MSGBOX_CONFIRM_TO_SELL_DISUSE_ITEM_TO_DELETE
string.body: %0 is an item that is not being used in the game anymore. Do you want to delete it?

string.name: STR_QUNAMARKET_TODATLIST_RESET_TIME
string.body: Time remaining until new items arrive: %DURATIONTIME0

string.name: STR_INDUN_COOLTIME_RESET_CONFIRM_QUNA
string.body:
%WORLDNAME0 You've used up all available entries.

Do you want to spend %quna1 to increase the number of times you can enter?

(Additional number of entry %num2 times)

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_HOME
string.body: •The Enchant/Remodel list for the registered item can be activated in the menu on the left.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_EXTRACT2
string.body: •Use an Extraction Supplement while extracting equipment to obtain additional Manastone Fasteners.

string.name: STR_DECOMPOSE_ITEM_DO_YOU_EXTRACT2_ITEM
string.body:
Do you want to use %0 to extract %1?

%0 and %1 will be destroyed after the extraction.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_FIRST_NOTICE
string.body:
Do you want to begin the tutorial?

Warning: Taking damage during the tutorial will end it permanently. Make sure you are somewhere safe!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_END_NOTICE
string.body:
Do you want to end the tutorial?

Warning: If the tutorial ends you cannot start again. You can check tutorial details under Mission/Quest - Quest - Completed Quests.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHY_POWER_BOOST
string.body: Ability to boost the power of physical attacks. Greater numbers mean stronger physical attacks.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVP_POWER_BOOST
string.body: Ability to boost the power of attacks on PCs. Greater numbers mean stronger attacks on PCs.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVE_POWER_BOOST
string.body: Ability to boost the power of attacks on monsters. Greater numbers mean stronger attacks on monsters.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVP_POWER_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Defense for attacks from PCs. Greater numbers mean a better defense from PC attack power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PVE_POWER_BOOST_RESIST
string.body: Defense for attacks from monsters. Greater numbers mean a better defense from monster attack power.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_OPTION_TITLE2
string.body: Manastone Socketing (can be used with Manastones with grade %0 or lower)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_COMPOUNDED_WEAPON_OPTION_TITLE2
string.body: Combination Manastone Socketing (can be used with Manastones with grade %0 or lower)

string.name: STR_INDUN_COOLTIME_RESET_SELECT8
string.body:
Add more entries by spending

%quna0?

(Increased number of entries: %num1 times)

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_ENCHANT_WARNING3
string.body: Failure means the Enchantment Level stays the same

string.name: STR_DEVA_MEMVER_DESC_LV0
string.body:
Increases Cube (Inventory) slots
Increases Sales Agency slots
Increases sales rate for Inventory Shop
Increases daily Gold Ingot exchange by 1

string.name: STR_DEVAMEMVERSHIP_INVENTORY_SEELITEM_TOOLTIP
string.body: Get a Daeva membership and you can sell items at the Inventory shop at a %0%% higher price.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_04
string.body: Press [Skills] to see what is available to you.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_06
string.body: Move skills to a quickbar for quick use.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_04
string.body: If you click [Profile], you can view your stats.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_06
string.body: Select a title to display it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_07
string.body: Select a stat bonus from your available titles.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_08
string.body: Titles and their stats may be selected separately.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_04
string.body: Press [Skills]. Here you can see all your abilities!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_05
string.body: In the skill tab, select [Custom Chains].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_06
string.body: Register skills from this tab in a slot to use them as a Chain Skill.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_07
string.body: Select the skill you want to use, and drag it to an empty slot.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_08
string.body: Put it into the first empty slot.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_09
string.body: Select the next skill you want and drag it to the Chain Skill slot.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_10
string.body: Put it into the second empty slot.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_11
string.body: You can register these Chain Skills in the quickbar.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_05
string.body: Select an item to enchant from your cube.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_06
string.body: Register equipment in the material slot of the Modify/Enchant window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_07
string.body: Press the [PvE Enchant Equipment] button to enchant equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_08
string.body: Select an Enchantment Stone and drag it to the Modify/Enchant window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_09
string.body: Register an item in the material slot of the Modify/Enchant window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_11
string.body: Get to it and start enchanting. Good luck!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_03
string.body: Press [Start] on the right hand side to call up the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_04
string.body: If you click [Profile] you can check your information.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_05
string.body: Select the [Info] tab on the top of the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_06
string.body: Click [Gear Set Settings] on the bottom of the My Info window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_08
string.body: Select [Current Gear] on the bottom of the settings screen.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_09
string.body: Press [Save] after registering your equipment to save your loadout.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_11
string.body: Select a weapon from your cube and put it into the 1st weapon slot.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_12
string.body: You can register a second weapon in the first weapon slot.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_13
string.body: Now press the [Save] button to save your current equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_14
string.body: Register gear sets 1 and 2 on the quickbar to switch quickly.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_03
string.body: Press [Start] to call up the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_04
string.body: Press [Modify/Enchant] to call up the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_05
string.body: Select an item from your cube to expand its Manastone slots.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_06
string.body: Register a piece of equipment in the Modify/Enchant window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_08
string.body: Manastone Fasteners in your cube are registered automatically.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_09
string.body: Press the [Expand Manastone Slots] button to expand your slots.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_10
string.body: Press the button to start the expansion. Good luck!

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_QUNABUFF_TOOLTIP_DESC
string.body: Increases stat points by 10% (depending on the entry level)

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_QUNABUFF_TOOLTIP_TITLE
string.body:
Lunamin's Cheer

You received Lunamin's Cheer! Your stats have increased. The effect of Lunamin's Cheer will disappear once you leave the dungeon.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_11
string.body: Now your Manastone Slot Expansion is done. Press [OK].

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_QUNABUFF_CONFIRM
string.body: Do you want to use %0[%gchar:luna] Luna to purchase a buff?

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_COMPOUND_WEAPON_VENDOR
string.body: You cannot use the Broker after the combination

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_DECOMPOUND_WEAPON_VENDOR
string.body: Can be sold via the Broker after removing the combination

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_SKIN_CHANGE_VENDOR
string.body: You cannot use the Broker after you modified the appearance

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_REMOVE_SKIN_CHANGE_VENDOR
string.body: Can be sold via the Broker after removing the appearance

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_EXTRACT3
string.body: •Extract PvE equipment to obtain Manastone Fasteners. If you extract PvP equipment, you can also obtain Fighting Spirit Fragments.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_PREDICT_SKIN_CHANGE_CAN_VENDOR
string.body: You can use the Broker after you modified the appearance

string.name: STR_TOPPING_DETAIL_AIRPORT_COST_REDUCE
string.body: Reduces the fee for Flying/Teleporting/Returning to Bind Point

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_UPGRADE_ENCHANT_PVE
string.body: Equipment Promotion (Available for PvE Enhancement Level %0 or higher)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_UPGRADE_ENCHANT_PVP
string.body: Equipment Promotion (Available for PvP Enhancement Level %0)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_UPGRADE_ENCHANT_PVE_PVP
string.body: Equipment Promotion (Available for PvE Enhancement Level %0 or PvP Enhancement Level %1 or higher)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_REPLACE_ENCHANT_PVE
string.body: Event Promotion (promotion is possible from PvE Enhancement level %0)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_REPLACE_ENCHANT_PVP
string.body: Event Promotion (Promotion possible for PvP Enhancement Level %0 or above)

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_REPLACE_ENCHANT_PVE_PVP
string.body: Event Promotion (promotion is possible from PvE Enhancement level %0 or PvP Enhancement Level %1)

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_01
string.body: Welcome. You seek strength. I will provide.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_02
string.body: Today's lesson is on skills. Pay attention.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_07
string.body: Open [Menu]-[Skills], and once you've opened the skill tab...

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_08
string.body: ...drag any skill from your tab to your quickbar to equip it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GUIDE_SKILL_09
string.body: When you find yourself in a real fight, use the skills on your quickbar.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_01
string.body: I see you've been listening to my teachings. Are you ready to learn more?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_02
string.body: When a Daeva is awarded a title, all should know.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_09
string.body: Open the [Title] tab in the [Profile] window of the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_10
string.body: Select the name and the stats of a title you wish to show.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_SET_TITLE_11
string.body: There is no need to be timid. Wear your title proudly!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_01
string.body: I see you received my summons.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_02
string.body: It's time to learn about user-defined skills.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_12
string.body: They are complex, but I have faith in your aptitude.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_13
string.body: Some skills may be chained together.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USER_CHAIN_SKILL_14
string.body: Think about what your attacks do and form a strategy.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_01
string.body: You're back? I see your thirst for knowledge is great.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_02
string.body: Your body and mind are not the only things that can be improved.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_13
string.body: You can attempt to Enchant your gear to strengthen it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_14
string.body: An Enchantment Stone's quality affects your chance of success.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_UPGRADE_ITEM_15
string.body: I pray that your luck runs deep... as do your pockets.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_01
string.body: Come to further your power? Open your ears then, and close your mouth.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_02
string.body: I will teach you how to expand Manastone slots in equipment.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_12
string.body: A wise Daeva looks to their equipment, but also how to hone it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_13
string.body: Once expanded, you can socket slots with Manastones.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_MATTER_SLOT_OPEN_14
string.body: Use this information wisely and become a great Daeva.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_01
string.body: I haven't seen you in quite a while....

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_02
string.body: You've found a great many trinkets, Daeva.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_15
string.body: Some armor is meant to be worn together. It will give you an edge.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_16
string.body: You can create loadouts of equipment, should you need to swap quickly.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_USE_EQQUIPMENT_SET_17
string.body: Strategy will always win over brute force. Remember that.

string.name: STR_ERR_CANT_EXECUTE_MORE_GAME_CLIENT_2
string.body: You cannot run more than one client at once. The game is being shut down.

string.name: STR_QUNAMARKET_BUTTON_CUSTOMIZING_DIMMEDTOOLTIP
string.body: Can only be used in Pandaemonium or Sanctum.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_ITEM_UPGRADE_TITLE
string.body: Equipment Promotion (equipment promotion is possible from %0)

string.name: STR_INGAME_MARKET_NOTUSE_FLYPASS
string.body: You cannot use the shop right now.

string.name: STR_INGAME_MARKET_NOTUSE_INSTANCE
string.body: Cannot be used in this server.

string.name: STR_INGAME_MARKET_NOTBUY_FLYPASS
string.body: You cannot purchase this while gliding or using a windstream.

string.name: STR_INGAME_MARKET_NOTBUY_COMPRESSED
string.body: You cannot purchase this while you have the item unequipped.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY_QINA
string.body: •The option types and stats will be bestowed again.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_DESC_REIDENTIFY_QUNA
string.body: •The stats of the selected option will be bestowed new.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_TOOL_REIDENTIFY_QUNA
string.body: * Select a random option for retuning.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDETERNITY_02
string.body: Ancient Weapon, Armor, Accessory, Feather Accessory/Ancient PvE Enchantment Stone

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDAB1_ERE
string.body: Ancient Weapon, Armor, Accessory, Plume Accessory

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDAB1_HEROES_L
string.body: Ancient Weapon, Armor, Accessory, Plume Accessory/Legendary Pauldrons, Gloves, Waistband

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDAB1_HEROES_D
string.body: Ancient Weapon, Armor, Accessory, Plume Accessory/Legendary Pauldrons, Gloves, Waistband

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF7_WEAPON
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Armor, Plume Accessory/Ultimate Pauldrons, Gloves

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDSEAL
string.body: Ancient and Legendary Weapon, Accessory/Ultimate Pants, Shoes

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_PARTY_L
string.body: You have received a reward for your great score at the Arena of Cooperation this season.

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_PARTY_D
string.body: You have received a reward for your great score at the Arena of Cooperation this season.

string.name: STR_ENCHANT_REIDENTIFY_QUNA_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to pay %0[%gchar:luna] Luna to retune?

If you press OK, it will be instantly applied and cannot be undone.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_COMPOSE_UI_INFO
string.body: You require 4 Minions at Stage 4 evolution for this combination.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_01
string.body: You have acquired something very rare.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_02
string.body: It is a Cubicle, used by Shugos to create Cubics.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_03
string.body: I will teach you how to use Cubicles to make a Cubic.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_04
string.body: First, click [Start] to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_05
string.body: Press [Cubic] to open the Cubic window to manage your Cubicle.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_06
string.body: You have is a Life Cubicle. Press the button [Life Cubic].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_07
string.body: Cubics are divided into different grades.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_08
string.body: Now select a Cubic from the list.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_09
string.body: The [Register] button will be available if you have an unregistered Cubic.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_10
string.body: Once you have registered enough Cubicles, they will activate and improve.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_11
string.body: You can register all your Cubicles at once by clicking [Register All].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_12
string.body: Cubics are a Shugo invention designed to increase their owner's abilities.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_13
string.body: You activate Cubicles by registering them in the Cubic window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_Cubic_14
string.body: I'm afraid that's all I can teach you for now.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_ATTEMPTED_FRAUD_180_DAYS
string.body:
Your account has been suspended for 180 days for violating the Code of Conduct.

For more information, please refer to the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_L2AUTH_BLOCK_FRAUD_PERMANENT
string.body:
Your account has been permanently banned for violating the Code of Conduct.

For more information, please refer to the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center.

string.name: STR_ZONE_COMMENT_IDDREADGION_04_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
The Ashunatal Dredgion, where the Elyos and Asmodians are tasked with defeating Frigate Commander Ashunatal while keeping each other in check.

The main rewards include Legendary Etium, Ultimate Etium, and a PvP Enchantment Stone Bundle.

string.name: STR_IDLDF5_FORTRESS_RE_MATCH_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
The Igdel Dome is a place where the Elyos and the Asmodians wage war until the time limit expires. The race that accumulates the most points wins. When you enter, all boost effects applied to you will disappear.

The main rewards include Legendary Etium, Ultimate Etium, and PvP Enchantment Stone Bundle.

string.name: STR_IDETERNITY_WAR_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
Use the base to score more points than the opposing faction. When you enter the instance, all Boost effects applied to you will disappear.

The main rewards include Legendary Etium, Ultimate Etium, and a PvP Enchantment Stone Bundle.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF7_Ere
string.body: Legendary and Ultimate Weapon, Armor, Wings

string.name: STR_IDBattle_Change_MATCH_REWARD_DESC
string.body:
Illumiel Brawl is a place where the Elyos and the Asmodians wage war using Transformation skills until the time limit expires. The faction that scores the most points or destroys the opponent's icon wins. Once you enter, all Boost effects applied to you disappear.

The main rewards include Legendary Etium and a PvP Enchantment Stone Bundle.

string.name: STR_STIGMA_CONFIRM_DIRECT_EQUIP
string.body: To equip this Stigma Crystal, you need <font font_xml="v3_msgbox_money">%qina0</font>. If you equip it yourself without a Stigma Master's aid, you cannot use any Stigma skills for 5 minutes. Are you sure you want to equip it?

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_idf7_ere_A
string.body: You are on a mission to rescue the Elite Squad inside The Veilenthrone.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_idf7_ere_B
string.body: You are working on a mission to rescue the Jotun inside The Veilenthrone.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_idf7_ere_C
string.body: You are working on a mission to board the Jotun Weapon inside The Veilenthrone.

string.name: STR_XIGNCODE_KICK
string.body: XIGNCODE3 not found. XIGNCODE3 must be running to play Aion.

string.name: STR_MTALK_RECEIVE_PHOTO
string.body: A photo has arrived from M Talk.

string.name: STR_MTALK_RECEIVE_IMOTICON
string.body: An emoticon has arrived from M Talk.

string.name: STR_MTALK_RECEIVE_MESSAGE
string.body: A message has arrived from M Talk.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_SLOT_TARGET_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Enchant Target

Adds the Daevanion Skill to be enchanted.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_SLOT_MATERIALORIGINAL_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Enchant Resource

You can enchant by using Daevanion Skill Books.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_SLOT_MATERIALSPECIAL_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Special Material

Can add materials that aid enchantment.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_COMPOSE_SLOT_TARGET_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Combination Results

Can view the results of Daevanion Skill Book combinations.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_COMPOSE_SLOT_MATERIALORIGINAL_TOOLTIP
string.body:
Combination Resource

You can combine Skill Books using Daevanion Skill Books.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_REINFORCE_INFO
string.body: ● Past +10 enchantment, a failed enchantment attempt always reverts the item back to +10. ● Only Legendary or higher quality Daevanion skills can be enchanted. ● Using a Skill Book of the target level increases the chance to successfully enchant the skill. ● Special Enchantment Materials prevent the level loss from a failed enchantment attempt. ● Items used in the enchantment process disappear. ● There is a chance for an enchantment attempt to fail. ● You cannot configure the Daevanion Skills while the Tune Daevanion Skills window is open.

string.name: STR_DEVANIONSKILLENCHANT_COMPOSE_INFO
string.body: ● Only Ancient or higher quality Daevanion Skill Books can be combined. ● You need a total of 4 Skill Books to combine them. ● There is a chance for a combination to yield a higher level item. ● Items used in a combination disappear.

string.name: STR_INSTANCE_DUNGEON_PARTY_3vs3_TOURNAMENT_DESC
string.body:
This is a 3v3 battle in which a total of 8 teams can participate.

The winner from the Arena of Tenacity will proceed to the next match.

Once a winning team is determined, the battle ends and rewards are distributed according to the rankings.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_029
string.body: We may look different, but we are one

string.name: STR_TransCollection_031
string.body: I worked hard for 100 days and I am still just a pixel?

string.name: STR_TransCollection_032
string.body: Welcome! First time wearing a Hanbok?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_1
string.body: Welcome! Did you know that you can increase your damage with Shards?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_2
string.body: I'll tell you more about how to increase your DPS.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_3
string.body: Press the [Menu] button on the right hand side to bring up the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_4
string.body: Click the [Profile] button in the menu to show the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_6
string.body: Select a Shard from your cube and slot it in the [Info] window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_7
string.body: Now the shard is registered, but isn't activated yet.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_8
string.body: Sometimes you need a little more DPS if your enemy is strong, right?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_9
string.body: Press the Shard icon at the bottom left of the screen to activate it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_2
string.body: This time, I'll tell you more about signing up to enter dungeons.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_3
string.body: Click the [Menu] on the right hand side to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_4
string.body: If you press the [Instance Info] button, the window appears.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_5
string.body: Here, you can check out the dungeon's information.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_PARTY_INSTANCE_LIST_6
string.body: Use this information wisely... or don't. The choice is yours.

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_COMPLETE_SEC_TIME
string.body: Less than 1 minute left to obtain a reward

string.name: STR_MISSION_01_DESC
string.body:
Preliminary TestComplete Tutorial 90000

TIP! This is an inactive mission for testing purposes.

string.name: STR_MISSION_02_TITLE
string.body: <font color="fa9dd6">[Tag]</font> Complete any of the QC tutorials

string.name: STR_MISSION_02_DESC
string.body:
Complete Any Tutorial

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to distinguish time periods.

string.name: STR_MISSION_03_DESC
string.body:
Verdant Granker Hunt

TIP! This is a Wednesday-only test mission.

string.name: STR_MISSION_04_DESC
string.body:
Hunt the Five-colored Vivel, Blue Horn Largon, Verdant Granker, or Wanderer Kerubim

TIP! This is an Elyos-only test mission.Preliminary Test

string.name: STR_MISSION_05_DESC
string.body:
Enter Lakrum

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to test level ranges (Levels 16 - 20).

string.name: STR_MISSION_06_TITLE
string.body: <font color="fa9dd6">[Tag]</font> Enter some fields of EnterWorld

string.name: STR_MISSION_06_DESC
string.body:
Enter Either Poeta or Ishalgen

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to test excess numbers of rewards (1).

string.name: STR_MISSION_07_TITLE
string.body: Collect 1 Daevanion Skill Box or Legendary Daevanion Skill Box

string.name: STR_MISSION_07_DESC
string.body:
Collect Daevanion Skill Box (6 types) or Legendary Daevanion Skill Box

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to test update cycles (0).

string.name: STR_MISSION_08_DESC
string.body:
Collect Secret Remedies 162005004 - 162005007

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to test update cycles (2).

string.name: STR_MISSION_09_TITLE
string.body: Use 1 High Grade Secret Remedy of Recovery or Special Grade Secret Remedy of Recovery

string.name: STR_MISSION_09_DESC
string.body:
Use 1 High Grade Secret Remedy of Recovery or Special Grade Secret Remedy of Recovery

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to test completed points (0).

string.name: STR_MISSION_10_DESC
string.body:
Use Secret Remedies 162005004 - 162005007

TIP! The purpose of this mission is to test completed points (2).

string.name: STR_MISSION_11_DESC
string.body: Kill a member of the opposing race

string.name: STR_MISSION_12_DESC
string.body: This is a test to see whether "Use the 190099001 trans_scroll_transparent_01 transparent transformation scroll" works for Minions as well (also testing text length)(also testing text length)(also testing text length)

string.name: STR_V70_SKILL_TOOLTIP_UI_TARGET_TARGET_AREA
string.body: Area within a Radius of Target

string.name: STR_FINAL_MISSION_01_DESC
string.body: Complete the quest you were given <font color="fd8548">3</font> times to obtain a reward!

string.name: STR_MISSION_13_TITLE
string.body: [Specifications] Hunt the Drakan Raiders and the Verdant Grankers

string.name: STR_MISSION_13_DESC
string.body: Hunt 1 Draconi Raider and 1 Verdant Granker through Alliance sharing.

string.name: STR_MISSION_14_TITLE
string.body: <font color="fa9dd6">[Tag]</font> Hunt the Drakan Raiders and the Verdant Grankers

string.name: STR_MISSION_14_DESC
string.body: Test to obtain several tags from one monster with an Alliance. Catch either a Draconi Raider or a Verdant Granker

string.name: STR_MISSION_15_TITLE
string.body: [Specifications] Collect 1 Daevanion Skill Box or Legendary Daevanion Skill Box

string.name: STR_MISSION_15_DESC
string.body: Alliance Share Check for "Collect Daevanion Skill Box (6 types) or Legendary Daevanion Skill Box"

string.name: STR_MISSION_16_DESC
string.body: Alliance Share Check for "Collect either one of the 162005004~162005007 secret remedies"

string.name: STR_MISSION_17_DESC
string.body: Alliance Share Check for "Kill a member of the opposing race"

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY1
string.body: Here's a daily quest I've prepared for you, Daeva. You can complete new quests every day!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY1
string.body: This one's a bit a difficult. But that also means there will be better rewards!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY2
string.body: For such a great Daeva, these won't be tough!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY3
string.body: Who's Lugbug? That's me! I have quests ready for you, Daeva!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY3
string.body: A Daeva should have no problems with these. Stay strong!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_DAILY4
string.body: Here's a daily quest I've prepared for you, Daeva. You can complete new quests every day!

string.name: STR_DAILYMISSION_BANNER_WEEKLY4
string.body: This one's a bit of difficult. But that also means that there will better rewards!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_02
string.body: It seems it's time to tell you more about the Luna Shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_03
string.body: Press the [Luna Shop] button on the lower right to open the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_04
string.body: The [Home] tab shows you recommended items and today's offers.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_05
string.body: Today's offers will be replaced after the period expires.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_06
string.body: Now select the [Function] tab in the Luna Shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_07
string.body: You can find functional items for sale in the [Function] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_08
string.body: Okay, now check out the [Outfit] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_09
string.body: In the [Outfit] tab, you can purchase various things for Luna.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_10
string.body: Now select the last of the Luna Shop tabs, [Event].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_11
string.body: In the [Event] tab, you can find items related to events.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_12
string.body: That's all I can teach you for now. Good luck!

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_13
string.body: The [Home] tab shows you recommended items and today's offers.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_14
string.body: Today's offers will be replaced after the period expires.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_15
string.body: Now select the [Function] tab in the Luna Shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_16
string.body: In the [Function] tab, various functional items are being sold.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_17
string.body: Okay, now check out the [Outfit] tab in the Luna Shop.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_18
string.body: In the [Outfit] tab, you can purchase various items for Luna.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_19
string.body: Now select the last of the Shop tabs, the [Event] tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_20
string.body: In the [Event] tab, you can find items related to events.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_QUNAMARKET_21
string.body: That's all I can teach you for now, unfortunately.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_01
string.body: Come, I think it's time to teach you more about transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_02
string.body: Press the [Menu] button on the right hand side to bring up the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_03
string.body: If you press the [Transformation] button, the related window appears. Here you can find all transformation related information.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_04
string.body: The [Profile] tab shows you an overview of transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_05
string.body: Now select the [Collection] tab among the transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_06
string.body: The [Collection] tab shows various additional effects available.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_08
string.body: In the [Contract] tab, you can use contracts to get new transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_10
string.body: In the [Combine] tab, you can combine transformations.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_12
string.body: In the [List] tab, you can see a list of all transformations you own.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_TRANSFORMATION_13
string.body: That's all I can teach you for now. Good luck!

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_POSITION_NEXT_SPECIAL
string.body: * This artifact was selected for Apsu's Protection in the next artifact battle.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_01
string.body: Congratulations on your advancement! Now it's time to tell you more about the Aion Homepage.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_02
string.body: First click the [Aion Homepage] button on the lower right hand side to call up the window.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_03
string.body: If you press [App Center], you'll open up the App Center.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_04
string.body: Here you can find announcements, character, legion, schedule, community, and guide information.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_NBATTERY_ITEM_10
string.body: Use this information wisely and become a strong Daeva.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_01
string.body: Interested in the Gold Sand Traders, huh?

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_02
string.body: I think it's time you learn more about them.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_03
string.body: Click the [Gold Sand Traders] button on the lower right to open the menu.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_04
string.body: In the [Kinah] tab, you can see various items you can purchase with Kinah.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_05
string.body: But be careful, some items are limited.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_06
string.body: Okay, now check out the [Costume] tab among the Gold Sand Traders tab.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_07
string.body: In the [Costume] tab, you can purchase various skins and appearances.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_08
string.body: You can select an item and see how it looks on you before you buy it.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_09
string.body: Okay, now select the tab [Gold Ingot].

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_10
string.body: The [Gold Ingot] tab shows you the items you can buy with Gold Ingots.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_11
string.body: Again, be careful. Some items are limited.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_GOLDSAND_12
string.body: That's all I can teach you for now. I trust you'll use the information wisely.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAb1_MiniCastle_A
string.body: You must defeat the Guardian of the Artifact to continue.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAb1_MiniCastle_B
string.body: Use the siege weapon to destroy the castle wall.

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAb1_MiniCastle_C
string.body: Use the siege weapon to defeat the Guardian Deity General.

string.name: STR_TUTORIAL_APPCENTER_05
string.body: That's all I can teach you for now. I trust you'll use the information wisely.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_01_DESC
string.body: Make a purchase in the Luna Shop once

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_02_DESC
string.body: Make a purchase in the Luna Shop 3 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly once

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_04_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly 2 times

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_05_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly 3 times

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_06_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly 4 times

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_07_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly 5 times

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_08_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly 6 times

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_09_DESC
string.body:
Obtain Leibo Jelly 7 times

Can be obtained from the [Daily]'s [Daily Reward].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_11_DESC
string.body:
Collect 50 Manastone Fasteners or Fighting Spirit Fragments

Completeable from the [Modify/Enchant] - [Equip Extraction] menu.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v70_13_DESC
string.body:
Craft Leibo Soul 1 time

Craftable in the [Morph Substances] menu under [Gather/Craft].

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Enter_v70_05_DESC
string.body:
Participate in the Arena of Discipline or Arena of Harmony Once

Can only enter the Arena of Discipline and the Arena of Harmony at specific times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_01_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 10 monsters in the field

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 30 monsters in the field

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 50 monsters in the field

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_04_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 300 monsters in the field or in dungeons

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_01_DESC
string.body:
Use potions, food, or drinks 10 times

You can also complete this with a Minion's [Auto Use] feature.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_02_DESC
string.body:
Use potions, food, or drinks 20 times

You can also complete this with a Minion's [Auto Use] feature.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Use Transformation Scrolls or Potions 10 times

You can also complete this with a Minion's [Auto Use] feature.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_04_DESC
string.body: Use Enchantment Stones to enchant equipment once

string.name: STR_Lugbug_ItemPlay_v70_05_DESC
string.body: Use Enchantment Stones to enchant equipment 5 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_01_DESC
string.body:
Participate in PvP 5 times

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_02_DESC
string.body:
Participate in PvP 10 times

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_03_DESC
string.body:
Participate in PvP 30 times

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_04_DESC
string.body:
Participate in PvP 60 times

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_PvP_V70_05_DESC

Participate in PvP 100 times

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.body:
Carry out 3 quests

Does not apply to event quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_02_DESC
string.body:
Carry out 5 quests

Does not apply to event quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_03_DESC
string.body:
Carry out 10 quests

Does not apply to event quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_04_DESC
string.body: Complete base battle quests in Lakrum 3 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_05_DESC
string.body: Complete an Instance Dungeon quest once

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_06_DESC
string.body: Complete an Instance Dungeon quest 3 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_08_DESC
string.body: Complete an Instance Dungeon quest 3 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_09_DESC
string.body: Complete an Instance Dungeon quest 10 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_10_DESC
string.body: Complete an urgent order in Demaha 12 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_11_DESC
string.body:
Reclaim an altar in Demaha 3 times

You can begin this quest through Commander Medena or Nulla.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v70_12_DESC
string.body:
Carry out Lugbug's Fortress Battle quest 2 times

TIP! You will automatically acquire Lugbug's Fortress Battle quest if you successfully occupy Divine Fortress, Lakrum Fortress, and Demaha Fortress.

string.name: STR_Daily_DESC_Normal
string.body: If you complete daily quests a certain number of times, you can receive special rewards.

string.name: STR_Weekly_DESC_Normal
string.body: If you complete weekly quests a certain number of times, you can receive special rewards.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_05
string.body: [Instance Dungeon] In the Name of Justice!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_05_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 1 Instance Dungeon boss

Not applicable if the target is 5 levels or more below yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_06_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 5 Instance Dungeon bosses

Not applicable if the target is 5 levels or more below yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_07
string.body: [Instance Dungeon] In the Name of Justice!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Hunt_v70_07_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 1 Instance Dungeon boss

string.body:
Defeat Illumiel's Kunax's Specter 1 time

TIP! When you successfully defeat Kunax's Specter, an Archon Siege Chariot appears.

string.body:
Collect 700 Genesis Crystals

TIP! You can acquire the Battle Points necessary to purchase items via various methods in the Evergale Canyon.

string.body:
Use Stellium Coins 3 times

You can use them by double-clicking in your Cube at level 80+.

string.name: STR_Daily_DESC_Lv01_75
string.body: Once you reach level 76, new quests will be available starting the next day at 9AM.

string.name: STR_Weekly_DESC_Lv01_75
string.body: Once you reach level 76, new quests will be available starting the following Wednesday.

string.name: STR_TransCollection_034
string.body: A squad of handsome men, if you're into that sort of thing.

string.body:

Use Transformation Scrolls or Potions 30 times

string.body:
Complete the Lost Lugbug quest once

Quest will automatically be accepted entering Demaha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_15_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 20 Monsters in the Demaha Plains

TIP! The Demaha Plains refers to the Valley Oasis, Regatus Guard Post, and Edoma Submontane.

string.body:
Defeat 20 Monsters in the Demaha Volcano Area

TIP! The Demaha Volcano Area refers to the Circle of Rebirth, Burning Path, and Volcano Ruins.

string.body:
Defeat 20 Monsters in the Demaha Desert

TIP! The Demaha Desert refers to the Lawless Wastes, Suhara Desert, and Apmaha's Heart.

string.body:
Defeat 20 Wasteland Apmaha in Demaha

Can be found around Apmaha's Heart.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_19_DESC

Can be found near the Regatus Guard Post and the Circle of Rebirth.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v70_20_DESC
string.body:

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_treasurehunter_05_DESC

TIP! If you get them from the Lonely Fairy at the D'maha Stellusia, you can exchange them for event rewards.

Destroy S'nua's Special Iron Bars and rescue the fairy 200 times

TIP! The fairy appears every day at 1 PM and 9 PM near the D'maha altar.

TIP! The Boss Monsters of Nostalgia appear Monday to Friday at 8:30 PM and Saturday and Sunday at 2 PM and 8:30 PM.

string.body:
Go to the Legion Banquet Hall and defeat Monsters of Nostalgia and collect 5 Trophies

TIP! You can enter the Legion Banquet Hall through the entrance at the D'maha Stellusia.

string.body:
Defeat the Ashunatal Legion of the Ashunatal Dredgion 5 times

Carry out the Altar Construction Support Quest 1 time

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_01

string.body: [15 Points/Weekly] Do You Remember the Kamar Battlefield?

string.body:
Enter the Kamar Battlefield 1 time

TIP! You can enter the Kamar Battlefield every Saturday at a certain time.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_03
string.body: [20 Points/Weekly] Nice to Meet You! And You're Dead!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_03_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate the Suffering Berserk Prometun 1 time at the Primeth's Forge (Hard)

TIP! You can enter the Primeth's Forge (Hard) from the Lakrum Endorim Temple.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_04_DESC
string.body:
Collect 150 Stellium

TIP! You can get Stellium from the D'maha altar battle and quests.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_05_L_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate the Enraged Mahorosh at Narakalli 2 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Live_6thPatch_05_D_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate the Enraged Mahorosh at Narakalli 2 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_01_DESC

Start the operations at Toyrunerk's Toy Factory

TIP! You can complete this quest by logging into Aion or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_02
string.body: [3 Points/Daily] Cleaning Up the Streets to Deliver Toys

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_02_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate 70 monsters in the D'maha field

TIP! You'll finish quicker if you do it with group members.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_03_DESC
string.body:
Find the Shining Capsule and gather broken toys 3 times

TIP! The Shining Capsule you find all over D'maha contains broken toys and toy parts.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_04
string.body: [5 Points/Weekly] Monopoly on the Toy Market 1

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_04_DESC
string.body:
Carry out 1 D'maha Urgent Order Quest

TIP! You can obtain D'maha Urgent Order Quests at the Plains, the Desert, the Lawless Zone, Aviation Zone, and Volcanic Area.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_05
string.body: [5 Points/Weekly] Monopoly on the Toy Market 2

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_05_DESC
string.body:
Carry out 3 D'maha Urgent Order Quests

TIP! You can obtain D'maha Urgent Order Quests at the Plains, the Desert, the Lawless Zone, Aviation Zone, and Volcanic Area.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_06

string.body:
Carry out 5 D'maha Urgent Order Quests

TIP! You can obtain D'maha Urgent Order Quests at the Plains, the Desert, the Lawless Zone, Aviation Zone, and Volcanic Area.

string.body: [5 Points/Weekly] Would You Like to Order a Toy? 1

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_07_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Weakened Daeva Mutant 2 times at the Stella Laboratory (Easy)

TIP! The Stella Laboratory is located in the Western Suhara Desert.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_ToyFactory_08
string.body: [5 Points/Weekly] Would You Like to Order a Toy? 2

string.body:
Eliminate Frigida 2 times at the Primeth's Forge

TIP! You can enter the Primeth's Forge from the Lakrum Endorim Temple.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_01
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Time for the D'maha Resource Battle!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_01_DESC
string.body:
Search for the Mineral Drill that appeared in D'maha.

TIP! You can complete this quest by logging into Aion or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_02
string.body: [2 Points/Daily] Arrest Shukirukin Who Stole the Minerals!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Mineral Thief Shukirukin 10 times

TIP! You can find the Shukirukin who stole the minerals in a specific area in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_L
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] We Cannot Let the Asmodians Steal Our Resources!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_L_DESC
string.body:
Carry out a scout quest 1 time to secure the resources

TIP! You can get the scout quest to defend the resources from the Guardian Staff Operation Officer.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_D
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] We Cannot Let the Elyos Steal Our Resources!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_03_D_DESC
string.body:
Carry out a scout quest 1 time to secure the resources

TIP! You can get the scout quest to defend the resources from the Archon Staff Operation Officer.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_04
string.body: [2 Points/Daily] Destroy the Drill and Gather Resources!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_04_DESC
string.body:
Destroy the Mineral Drill or the Strong Mineral Drill 2 times

TIP! Use the Gold Sand Traders' Drill Destruction Bomb to deal large damage to the drill.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_BattleMaterial_05_DESC
string.body:
Extract Mysterious Minerals 10 times

TIP! Use the Gold Sand Traders' Mineral Extractor to extract mysterious minerals.

string.name: STR_PLAYNC_BLOCK_STOLEN_PAY_ETERNAL
string.body:
Your integrated account has been banned (permanent suspension for all game services provided by our company) due to fraudulent use of another's payment method.
For more information, please inquire through the 1:1 Petition service available at the plaync (www.plaync.com) website's customer center, or call 1600-0020 (Korea).

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_01_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate Baron Gracheni 1 time

TIP! Baron Gracheni is the head of the Gracheni gang.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_02_DESC
string.body:
Gather 30 keys to Gracheni's Treasures

TIP! You can find Gracheni's Treasures Key when you reach S-C Rank inWicked Gracheni's Vault.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_03_DESC
string.body:
Reach S Rank in Wicked Gracheni's Vault 3 times

TIP! You need to defeat Baron Gracheni in the given time to get S Rank.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_Devaranger_04_DESC
string.body:
Reach S Rank in Wicked Gracheni's Vault 5 times

TIP! You need to defeat Baron Gracheni in the given time to get S Rank.

string.name: STR_RESURRECT_TRAINING_DESC
string.body: Resurrects at the Underground Training Center in Stellusia.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_PHYSICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_BOOST_RATE
string.body: Ability to greatly increase Physical Crit Damage. The higher the value, the stronger the Physical Crit Damage becomes.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_CHR_STAT_MAGICAL_CRITICAL_DAMAGE_BOOST_RATE
string.body: Ability to greatly increase Magic Crit Damage. The higher the value, the stronger the Magic Crit Damage becomes.

string.body: I Am the Boss of This Area

string.body: An Attractive Face Completes the Look

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_01
string.body: [Daily] To Farm, Get Rid of Weeds First!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_01_DESC
string.body:
Remove the Weedy Vines that grow in D'maha 1 time

TIP! The Weedy Vines grow all over D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_02_DESC
string.body:
Use Ordinary Seeds or Special Seeds 3 times in D'maha

TIP! Locations to plant each seed are limited.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_03_DESC
string.body:
Gather Specialty Fruit or Fancy Fruit 1 time

TIP! Use seeds and let them go through the germination, growth, ripening, and harvest stages.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V70_AIONFarm_04_DESC
string.body:
Gather a Basket Full of Water 1 time

TIP! Go to the D'maha Swamp and use the Empty Basket to obtain the Basket Full of Water.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Quest_v72_01
string.body: [D'maha] A Battle for the Honor of the Race

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v72_01
string.body: [Crucible Spire] Champion of the Lower Levels

string.body:
Carry out the Guardian Deity General Battle Quest at the 10th Altar 1 time

TIP! You can obtain the Guardian Deity General Battle Quest if you fulfill certain conditions.

string.body:
Carry out Katalam's [Urgent Order] Defending Strategic Points Quest 6 times

TIP! You will automatically obtain the Urgent Order quests in certain areas in Katalam.

string.body:
Eliminate the Master of Miasma on the 15th floor of the lower level 1 time

string.body:
Win in the Arena of Discipline or the Arena of Harmony 1 time

TIP! You can only enter the Arena of Discipline and the Arena of Harmony at certain times.

string.body: Use Enchantment Stones to enchant equipment 3 times

string.name: STR_Lugbug_pvp_V72_01_DESC
string.body:
Participate in PvP 300 times

TIP! Not applicable if the target's level is more than 5 levels lower than the character's.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_01
string.body: Daeva Growth; Preparation for Becoming a True Daeva

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_02
string.body: Items for Daeva, Make Your Dreams Come True!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_03
string.body: [Daily] Items for Daevas, Teaching the Rascal Rabbit a Lesson

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_05
string.body: [Weekly] A Clash of Daevas! Enjoy the Fierce Battle!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_06
string.body: [Weekly] Daeva Transformation - New Challenge Tower Conquer

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_07

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_08
string.body: [Weekly] Daeva Transformation - Attacking the Hererim Mine

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_09
string.body: [Weekly] Daeva Transformation - Attacking the Hererim Mine

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_01_DESC
string.body:
Obtain 2 Wind Road of Growth PvE Pieces

TIP! You can get Wind Road of Growth PvE Pieces by carrying out a [Guide] quest in the Mission/Quest [J] window.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_02_DESC
string.body:
Obtain 1 Shining Treasure Chest

TIP! You can get a Shining Treasure Chest at the Shining Magic Fountain.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_03_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate the Larcenous Rascal Rabbit 50 times

TIP! You can find the Larcenous Rascal Rabbit in Lakrum or D'maha.

string.body:
Collect 1 Precious Daeva Trophy

TIP! The trophy can be obtained when a group member with a Daeva's Master Key opens the Sealed Treasure Chest.

string.body:
Obtain Beritra's Lost Battleground Bundle 7 times

TIP! You can get Etium, Stellium, and Genesis Crystals from Beritra's Lost Battleground Bundle.

string.body:
Eliminate the true Golden Pig at the Challenge Tower (Lower Level) 8th Floor 2 times

TIP! You can enter the Challenge Tower 4 times a week and select whether you want to do the lower level or the middle level.

string.body:
Eliminate Slayer Kunax at the Idgel Dome 1 time

TIP! The Idgel Dome is only open on Tuesdays, Fridays, and Sundays at certain times.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_08_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate the Dark Sorcerer Bugarota at the Hererim Mine 3 times

TIP! You can enter the Hererim Mine from the Tunes of Splendor Legion Garrison in Lakrum.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_DevaLegend_09_DESC
string.body:
Eliminate the Dark Sorcerer Bugarota at the Hererim Mine 3 times

TIP! You can enter the Hererim Mine from the Archon's Shadow Legion Garrison in Lakrum.

string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Want a Taste of Something Cold?

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_01_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Blazey, the culprit of D'maha's intense heat, 30 times

TIP! You can find Blazey in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Scorchy, the culprit of D'maha's intense heat, 30 times

TIP! You can find Scorchy in D'maha between 20:00 to 21:00.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_03_DESC
string.body:
Use Waterspout Fufu 30 times

TIP! You can obtain Waterspout Fufu through event missions, login rewards, and the Gold Sand Traders.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_04_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Blazey, the culprit of D'maha's intense heat, 150 times

TIP! You can find Blazey in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_05_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Scorchy, the culprit of D'maha's intense heat, 150 times

TIP! You can find Scorchy in D'maha between 20:00 to 21:00.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_TheWar_06_DESC
string.body:
Use Waterspout Fufu 100 times

TIP! You can obtain Waterspout Fufu through event missions, login rewards, and the Gold Sand Traders.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_02_DESC
string.body:
Collect 120 Blood Marks

TIP! You can exchange Blood Marks for various items through Hart, Kairan, Pasirunerk, and Hajirunerk.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_03_DESC
string.body:
Collect 120 Blood Marks

TIP! You can exchange Blood Marks for various items through Lotelli, Azina, Pasirunerk, and Hajirunerk.

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_TotalWorldPlayTime_BODY
string.body: Rift now available. Time begins being consumed upon entering Crimson Katalam. Once time has run out, you can no longer enter Crimson Katalam and will be forced to leave.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_02
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Gather the Ring of Promise Pieces

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_05
string.body: [3 Points/Weekly] I Want a Better Ring

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_06
string.body: [3 Points/Weekly] Make Your Love Come True

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_08
string.body: [5 Points/Weekly] Creatures Causing Trouble in D'maha

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_01_DESC
string.body:
Carry out 2 D'maha Urgent Order Quests

TIP! You can obtain D'maha Urgent Order Quests in the Plains, the Desert, the Lawless Zone, Aviation Zone, and Volcanic Area.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_02_DESC
string.body:
Obtain 1 [Event] Ring of Promise

TIP! You can obtain the Ring of Promise by gathering its pieces and assembling them.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Cursed Ribbit 50 times

TIP! You can find Cursed Ribbit in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_04_DESC
string.body:
Appraise the Ring of Promise 1 time

TIP! Take the Ring of Promise to Pamred at Stellusia to get it appraised.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_05_DESC
string.body:
Upgrade the Ring of Promise 1 time

TIP! Take the Ring of Promise to Enio at Stellusia to get it upgraded.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_06_DESC
string.body:
Use the Ancient Ring of Promise, Legendary Ring of Promise, and Ultimate Ring of Promise 10 times

TIP! The locations to use the Ring of Promise varies depending on the ring's grade.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_07_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the monsters that have stolen the Ring of Promise Piece 10 times

TIP! The thieving monsters refers to Nergal, Beritra, Frigida, Weakened Daeva Mutant, and Daeva Mutant.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Ring_08_DESC
string.body:
Defeat an Ancient Creation and obtain the [Event] Ancient Creation Trophy 3 times

TIP! You can obtain the Ancient Creation Trophy by defeating an Ancient Creation in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_04_DESC
string.body:
Collect 15 Ponica Fiber, Carbonium, and Peridot in Crimson Katalam

TIP! The item count is updated whenever any one of your group members obtains something.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v72_05_DESC
string.body:
Collect 15 Ponica Fiber, Carbonium, and Peridot in Crimson Katalam

TIP! The item count is updated whenever any one of your group members obtains something.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v72_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat monsters in Crimson Katalam 50 times

TIP! Only the kill count of the group that has contributed the most in defeating the target monster will be updated.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_hunt_v72_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat monsters in Crimson Katalam 50 times

TIP! Only the kill count of the group that has contributed the most in defeating the target monster will be updated.

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF8_HOUSE_NORMAL
string.body: Legendary and Ultimate Weapon/Ultimate Accessory/Ultimate Weapon Box Crafting Design

string.name: STR_INDUN_ITEM_INFO_IDF8_HOUSE_EASY
string.body: Legendary and Ultimate Accessory, Plume Accessory

string.name: STR_Topping_PVEPowerBoost_I_DESC
string.body: Increases PvE Bonus Attack by 50 points.

string.name: STR_Topping_PVEPowerBoost_II_DESC
string.body: Increases PvE Bonus Attack by 80 points.

string.name: STR_Topping_PVEPowerBoost_III_DESC
string.body: Increases PvE Bonus Attack by 100 points.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_01
string.body: <font color="FFA7A7">[Daily] Here Comes Anubis, God of the Dead!</font>

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_02
string.body: <font color="FFA7A7">[Daily] Beautiful Kleon and Her Story</font>

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_01_DESC
string.body:
Destroy one portal to the Underworld spawning in D'maha

TIP! Attack a portal to the Underworld for the thieves of Kleon's Soul to appear.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_02_DESC
string.body:
Deliver Kleon's Scattered Souls to Ramsus or Death Angel Kilt once

TIP! The result varies with the number of souls that Ramsus and Death Angel Kilt have collected.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_03_DESC
string.body:
Use Anubis' Avatar Summoning Stone once in D'maha

TIP! You can obtain Anubis's Avatar Summoning Stone in the Login Reward Event.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_04_DESC
string.body:
Play the quest Kleon's Dilemma 3 times

TIP! You can receive the daily quest once a day from Kleon in Stellusia.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_05_DESC
string.body:
Collect Middle Earth Marks or Underworld Marks 10 times

TIP! You can obtain the marks by delivering Kleon's Scattered Souls to Ramsus or Death Angel Kilt.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_06_DESC
string.body:
Collect Kleon's Scattered Souls 50 times

TIP! Defeat the Robbers of Kleon's Soul to obtain them.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_ZKillorKill_07_DESC
string.body:
Exchange marks 3 times with the Smuggler in the Orbis Training Center

TIP! It costs 150,000 Kinah to exchange marks with Changernerk or Changerunerk.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Run_01
string.body: <font color="D1B2FF">[2 Points/Daily] Run to the Finish!</font>

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Run_01_DESC
string.body:
Finish the Animal Farm Race once

TIP! Press the Request Entry button on the bottom right to participate in the Animal Farm Race.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Run_02_DESC
string.body:
Obtain orbs required to use skills in the Animal Farm Race 30 times

TIP! You can obtain orbs required to use skills from the Blue Spheres that appear randomly on the racing track.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Run_03_DESC
string.body:
Win the Animal Farm Race 2 times

TIP! The count is updated when you obtain the Animal Farm Race Championship Trophy.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Run_04_DESC
string.body:
Finish the Animal Farm Race 5 times

TIP! The count is updated when you obtain the Animal Farm Race Completion Trophy.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_Run_05_DESC
string.body:
Collect Animal Farm Medals 100 times

TIP! You can obtain Animal Farm Medals from the Animal Farm Race Treasure Chest.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_EVOLVE_UI_FAIL_CONFIRM
string.body:
Do you want to try evolution with %1 %0?
If the evolution succeeds, Evolution Stage increases by 1. If the evolution fails,
Evolution Stage remains the same, but the evolution success rate bonus increases.
Click the Confirm button to start evolution.

string.body:
Uses the Minion below as upgrade material.
This Minion cannot be restored.

string.name: STR_FAMILIAR_AUTHORIZE_CONFIRM_UI_INFO
string.body:
The Minion below will be used as combination material.
Once used, it cannot be restored.

string.body: Tempering Level %0, Evolution Stage %0, Minion Points %1 required

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_02
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Eat Honey Songpyon, Get Moon Rabbit Energy, Hop!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_03
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Take Back Honey from Sweet Fist Daru, Hop!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_04
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Rise the Pine Lover Moon, Hop!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_05
string.body: [1 Point/Daily] Explore Red Katalam for Me, Hop!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_06
string.body: [3 Points/Weekly] Find the Rice Flour Thief, Hop!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_07
string.body: [3 Points/Weekly] Here Comes Honey Songpyon Chef, Hop!

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_01_DESC
string.body:
Try to Make Songpyon

TIP! You can complete this quest by logging into Aion or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_02_DESC
string.body:
Make Honey Songpyon 1 time

TIP! You can make it with 5 Honeys, 1 Rice Flour, and 2 Pine Needles on the Honey Songpyon Crafting Table.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Sweet Fist Daru near the D'maha Altar 30 times

TIP! You can defeat Sweet Fist Daru only near an altar occupied by an enemy race.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_04_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Pine Lover Moon 10 times

TIP! Pine Lover Moon appears in D'maha from 20:00 to 22:00 everyday.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_05_DESC
string.body:
Defeat monsters in Red Katalam 30 times

TIP! You can go to Red Katalam through the Dimensional Rift in Stellusia, D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_06_DESC
string.body:
Defeat 10 Instance Dungeon boss monsters

TIP! Not applicable if the target's level is more than 5 levels lower than the character's.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_07_DESC
string.body:
Make Honey Songpyon 10 times

TIP! You can make it with 5 Honeys, 1 Rice Flour, and 2 Pine Needles on the Honey Songpyon Crafting Table.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_08_DESC
string.body:
Obtain the last reward of Lugbug's Weekly Mission once

TIP! Complete seven weekly missions to receive the last weekly mission reward.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_songpyeon_09_DESC
string.body:
Craft Small Honey Songpyon Basket once

TIP! There's a certain chance to obtain it by giving Honey Songpyon and 700,000 Kinah to Arnev in Stellusia.

string.name: STR_STIGMA_SET_EFFECT_TOOLTIP_SLOT_3
string.body: When all slots are equipped with Upgraded Stigma: \nGreater Stigma slot +%0, Normal Stigma slot +%1

string.name: STR_TOOLTIP_FAMILIAR_UNLEARNED_SKILL_CON_AUTH_DESC
string.body: Minion at Ascension Level %0 and Evolution Stage %1

string.name: STR_UI_Gauge_Desc_IDAbRe_Up3_urf_A
string.body: You must find the Minium Box before the Minion.

string.name: STR_Topping_vitaminBoost_I_DESC
string.body: You receive the benefits of Shura's Vigor Prayer.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_01_DESC
string.body:
Find Hungry Hungrinerk to deliver strawberry cake!

TIP! You can complete this quest by logging into Aion or teleporting.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_02_DESC
string.body:
Play the quest Mauminerk's Request: Find Kekirinerk! 1 time

TIP! You can receive the quest from Mauminerk in Stellusia.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_03_DESC
string.body:
Defeat the Suspicious Box Monster 5 times

TIP! You can find the Suspicious Box Monster cake thief in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_04_DESC
string.body:
Participate in PvP 10 times

Unapplicable if the target's level is 5 or more levels lower than yours.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_05_DESC
string.body:
Obtain 30 Flours

TIP! You can receive 1 Flour per hour logged in and up to 6 per day.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_06_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Foodie once

TIP! You can find Foodie, the Big Cake Box guard, in D'maha.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_event_V72_shugoS2cake_07_DESC
string.body:
Play the quest Mauminerk's Request: Find Kekirinerk! 15 times

TIP! You can receive the quest from Mauminerk in Stellusia.

string.body: Reward from the Broken Abyssal Debris

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_IDEVENT_DAMAGE_01_L
string.body: This reward is given for an excellent performance in the Broken Abyssal Debris.

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_TITLE_IDEVENT_DAMAGE_01_D
string.body: Reward from the Broken Abyssal Debris

string.name: STR_RANK_MAIL_BODY_IDEVENT_DAMAGE_01_D
string.body: This reward is given for an excellent performance in the Broken Abyssal Debris.

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_larak

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_holytower
string.body: [Weekly] Demaha Essence found in Frozen Monolith

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_prigida
string.body: [Weekly] Demaha Essence retrieved back from Frigida

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_easy_lab
string.body: [Weekly] Demaha Essence found in Research Center(Easy)

string.name: STR_World_dmaha_mind_hard_lab
string.body: [Weekly] Demaha Essence hidden in the Research Center(Normal)

string.name: STR_World_Lugbug_event_V72_Winter_daily_01_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Bitterbristle the Flurryious 2 times

TIP! You can find him in Demaha or Lakrum every day at 21:00.

string.name: STR_World_Lugbug_event_V72_Winter_weekly_02_DESC
string.body:
Defeat Bitterbristle the Flurryious 5 times

TIP! You can find him in Demaha or Lakrum every day at 21:00.

string.name: STR_Lugbug_Collect_v75_18_DESC
string.body:
Hard Acorns Collect 50

TIP! The collected Hard Acorns can be exchanged for necessary items through Acorn Crafting Apprentice.
